kyi ma 'dres chos// rtag pa med cing ma bar rtog med par// rang byung tang de 'dzin la mnyam gnas kyang// chos rnams kun la m gnas bsam gtan byed//de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma
'dresachos// 'dren pa'i shes rab kyis rab ston cing// sems can kun gyi spyod pa zabamkhyen te/ de dag la nibasams bzhi'i chos kyang 'chad// de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos//
zla nyan thos rnams kyi rnam grol sgra phyir 'go// rang rgyalaphyi nakyin gyi'adu shes to// sangs rgyas rnams kyi btang snyoms bsam ma khyad// chags lasarab 'das dri med nam mkha' bzhin//
sems kyi rgyud 'di'i nga bzhin rnam grol te// sems n sngon nas bcings par gyur pa med// ji ltar rnam grol de ltar chos sten te//de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// gshegs dang bzhugs
dang grong khyer 'jug pa dang//sbyod lam dag na mthong n mag kyang 'phrog/ sangs rgyas rnams ni dpe byad bzang po dang// mtshan dang 'od rnams thams cad 'dul bzhugs// sems can snang
po nam zhog bod gtong tshe/ srogachags bya ba mang po bder 'gyur te// 'od kyis rig pa dag 'dul ba 'gyur// den rgyalub rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// rang byung ban gsung gcig brjod
bsan// sems can bsam pa bzhin du/sung thos te// brag cha lta bur de yi gsung yang thos// de nastsal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ yashes kyis ni 'dren pa 'olas byas te// bde bar
gshags lasems masacung zad med// sems can basam la ye shes rjesasu zhugs// de nirgyal ba rnams kyis 'dasachos// ting 'dzani bsam gtan dang ni rab ldan te// spros paThams cad kyi yang rgyu
ba med// nam mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid du gnas// du nargyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dresachos/ 'das pa'i dus la de yi ma shes zhugs// 'gro ba sna tshogs rnam 'byed shes pa ya/chos rnams kun laM
sgrub pa med par 'jug/ de nargyal ba rnams ma 'dresachos// ma 'ongs dusan gang dag 'jig rten du// 'phyang bar 'gyur dang 'byung bar ma 'gyur dang// sems can zhing dang rgyal ba bshad pa dang//de dag
thams cad sangs rgyas malus mkhyen// ma 'ongs de la rjesasu rab zhing// de bzhin sems na rnams kyi chos kyang mkhyen// de yims ni g.yeng bar ma'agyur te/
ldan rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos// da ltar lam gang 'jug par 'gyur ba dgo// thams cad rgyal bas chags med rab tu mkhyen// 'dren pa'i spyod yul nam mkha' lta bu ste// de ni rgyal ba rnam kyi
'dres chos// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nim 'dresapa// bcobargyad gsungs pabasamagyisamakhyamaste// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' 'dra ba na// dad mkhas byang chub sems dpa'

rgyud dad par byed// shA ri'i bu 'dangag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag dang ldan pas// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
ba'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs naseng ge 'i sgra yang dag par sgrogatsang khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che sa/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig
rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ra// shari'i bu da ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gyis ma khyab pa 'du bcus/ de bzhin
gshegs pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches rab tu rtog/ som nyi mi byed/ the tsam ma zi/ rtsacher ngaga' mgu ste rang sa pa ked cing/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed red/ de bzhin
gshags pa'i bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// dbam de brgyud pa// gzhan yang shA'i bu de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod du rig/ byang chub sems dang 'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod du rag/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du
' gnas / de'i drud du gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston te// de ltabasan shAba'i bu rnam grangs 'das kyang de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sed du 'ag// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnamagrangs kyi sked du rag/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi sbed du ragi nas//
da'i drung du gshegs te/ byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tuston pas de ltar rig par bya'o shA na'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang chos
kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ tshodamadapa/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgu dam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung pa chen po zhes
bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas btsam ldan 'das/
'jig rten du byungaste/ gang 'di ltar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ bdud du babs pa dang/ tshas par bcas pa dang/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skyedagu dang/
lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yan du bcas pa'i 'dzagi rten rang ga mngon pa shes ra sa mngon sum du byas tu bsgrubs nas gnas so// de chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa// thog mar dug ba/ bar du dag pa/
thamar dge ba/don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang pa/ ma 'dris pa/ yodas su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// shApa'id bzhani gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung pa chen po'anyen thes khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi nyan thos kyi tshogs chen pa byung ste// thams cad kyi dag bcom pa/ zag pa/
zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa// sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag gi shA ba'i bu de'i dusan rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya baches can chos kyi rgyal
po zhig byung ngo// yang shar 'i bu rgyal ba tsho rnam par rgyal ba'i grong khyer rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rgyalapo'i gnas 'byor pa/mod pa/ bdeb/ lo legs pa// dga' ba/ 'gro

! ba mang po dang/ mas gang bzhag yod de/ yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i khyi'u gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa zhes bya ba sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/
sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchogadang ldan pa zhig byung ste/
langashA ra'i bu dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod btsun mo 'khor dang lhan cig tu skyed mos tshul gyi sa ru byang bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomo pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas phung po chen pos// e ma'o gzhon su'ang med cing chub sams dang 'a sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snodado// i mtho gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod 'di ni sangs
rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod do zhes de ltar gasnas skyed mos tshal gyis ga la ba dang/ gzhon nu brtsoma'agrus spyod ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ gzhon
nubartson 'grus spyod la byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston to// de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams labartson
pa dang bsdu ba'odinges re rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste da na byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o// de lasems can thams cad la byams pa gang zhe na/ 'dil gzhon nu byang chub sems
dpa' la ni sems can gyi khams ji tsam pa de tsam du byams pas khyab par byed do// sems n gyi khams ji tsam zhan/ nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam mo//
gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i khams 'dis khyab par ma gyur pa gang yang med do// gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa 'dis sems can gyi ras
na gang khyab par ma gyur pa'i sems can de gang yang med do// 'dilta ste/ gzhon du sems can gyi khams dpag tu med par khazhin du/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bsgres
pa'i ng dpag tu med do// gzhonanud ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pas sems can mtha' yas/ sems n+tan mtha' yas pas byams pa mtha' yas se// ga 'o na na yang sa can
rgyu gyi khams na ches mang gi/ sa'i khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams ni de lta ma an mod kyi/ 'on kyang gzhon nu sems can gyi las tshur mid pa
dzatsam pa de'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bstan to// gzhon nu 'di lta ste// dper na shar pa lags su 'jig rten kyi khams gda'i krung gi bu ma snyed dang/ 5 nu gdam byang dang//
de bzhin du phyogs mtshams dang/ phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten tsa khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snye8dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad rgyus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtshos 2 pa ma rdo yo/
gcig dugyur pa la yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de la sems can g+hApa'i krung go bye ma snyad 'dus nas/ brgyar brtsal ba'i sman+ti rtse mos chu'i thugs pa gtsag blangs/ gzhan yang
sems can gang+ga'i klung gi ma snyed 'dus nas/ brgyal brtsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chub thags pa gnyis pa blangs/ gzhan yang sems can g+hApa'i klung gi byam snyad 'dus nas/
brgyar brtsal ba'i sgra'i rtse mos chu'i thabis pa gsum pa blangs na/ gzhon nu yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de lta bu'i thabs kyis chu'i phung po chen po de zad par gyur kyang/ sems
can gyi khams na tshod dang mtha' med de/ gzhon nu sems can gyi khams de ltar dapag tu med cing de ltar mtha' yas pa de thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas khyab par byed do//
gzhon nu de ji snyam du sems/ gang di ltar dpog tu med par byams paskoms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsel pa// bcom ldan 'das de ma lugs
so bde bar gshogs pa dam lags so// gzhon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen pa sgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba na dpag tu med pa
yin te gzhonanu de'abyams ban bdag srung ba yin te/ gzhan la phan par gnas pa yin/ mchog tu gnod sems med pa// khro ba dang gnod sems kyi tha ba dang bral ba/
nyesapa 'jom pa// rjesasu chags pa'i kun nas ldang bdang bral ba/ dad pa kun tu ston pa/ 'khrul pa thams cad las pa lta ba/ yongs su gdung ba med pa// lus dang/
ngag dang/ sems bdeb skyed pa// gzhan gyis gnod pa bya ba thams cad du ma lhang ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba/
'phags pa'i la mdang mthun pa// gshe ba dang khros pa la dang ba skyed pa// g.yul thams cad las sgrol ba/ dbyig pa dang mtshon cham thogs pa/ sems can rab tu thar
par bya ba la dga' ba/ khong khro ba thams cad dang bralal/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ kha gsag dang/ 'ad+ded pa dang/ gzhogaslongs thams cad dang bral ba/ rang gi myud pa dang/
bkur sti dang/ tshigs su bcad pas lta ba 'tsho ba/ brgya byin dang tshangs pas phyag byas// rang gi gzig brjod kyis brgyan pa// mkhas pas bstod pa// byas pa thams cad
rjes su srung ba/ tshangs pa'i lam dang mthunang/ 'dod pa'i khams dang ma 'dresapa/ thar pa'i lam spyi la gtso bor gyur pa/ theg pa thams cad kyis yang dag par brdung ba/ tsang
zing med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs pasags pa/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyis grwa'i rgya ma non pa/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bkang ra/
yang dag par brgyan pa// dbang po nyams shing mang pa thams cad spangs pa/ bde 'gro dang mya ngan las 'da' pa'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba/ ngan song thams cad dang ma bam Na/
brgyad las bzlog pa/ sa kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang da dbang pa dang/ rgyal srangal mngan par ma dga' ba/ sems can
thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis sbran pa rab tu sbyor ba/ tha dadapa'i 'du shes dang bralal/ tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgo dang lam/ tshul khrims 'chal po
thams cad kyi skyabs/ bzod pa'i stobs kun tu ston pa/ nga rgyal dang/ stsogs pa dang/ dregs pa go nga dang bral ba/ ma 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa/ yang dag
par sbyor ba'i bya ba sgrol ba/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ tang ngo 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i rtsa ba nyon mongs pa las byung ba/ sems nges par rtog
pa thos pa 'dzin pas shes rab kyi rgyu skyed pa'i byams pa/ bdag gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs 'joms pa/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs sel ba// 'grogs na bde/
ba ldang ba dang/ slong ba dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyal ba'i spyod lam srung bar byed pa/ rgod pa 'i rang bzhin yodi la byed pa thams cad sal ba/ dri zhim pas phyags pa//
khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pas phyugs la/ mi khom pa dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ ngan 'gro thams cad sel ba'i byams pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad skyob pa'i byams
bya/// pa chen po// bdag ga bde ba btang ba/ sems can thams cad la bde ba la ba tu sbyani pa ste/ gzhon nu nyan thos rnams kyi byams pa ni bdag skyob pa'o/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can thams cad la rgyab pa'o// yang ba gzhon nu byang chub 'os dpa' sems dung dongaspyod pa mas kyi byams pa ra saMms can lamig
pa'o byang chub sems dang 'a spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi byams pa ni chos la dmigs pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa rab tu mo ra rnams sems pa ni dmags pa med
pa'i[ï¼š]gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnasas byams pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpal yum pa de/ dzam du la/ nus pas sems can mas cad
la byams pas khyab par byed de// de la gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ gzhon nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i snganangu 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o// 'di ltaste/ dpal nagazhananu skyas bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba na dbugs 'byang ba dang rngub pa'o// gzhon
nu de bzhin du theg pa chen pa yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'gro ba na snying rje chen po'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na gzhon nu 'khor 'disosgyur pa'i rgyal po'i rin pa na

[ro/]thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ma 'khor lo rin po cha yin no// gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba na snying rje chen
pe yanito snyadi rjen ngo debang sems can thams cad rjes su ma gtod pa'o/ gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen pa sems can thams cad la dza ra'ajug ce na/
gzhon nu'ad ltar byang chub sems dpas 'jig tshogs la lta bas phamangs shing ltakhar gyur pa/ rnam pa mang pa la chags pa'i samasacan dag mthong na/ de dag gi 'ji'o tshogs lalta
bas bcings pa spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes/ sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa' skang rje chen po 'jug gi gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems
dbas sems can yang dag pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log gi gnas la gnas te/ ma rtag pal rtag par 'dushes pa dang/ sdug pasngal la bde bar 'du shesapa dang/
bdag med pa la bdag tu 'ashes pa dang/ mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa mthong na/ dedag gi ring la sa ma yazhir 'i phyin ci log spang ba'i phyir chos lastan tezhis//
sems can rnams la byang chub sems dapa'i snying rje chen po 'dzag go/ gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpas phyin ci log gi 'dod pa la sred pa'i sems can ng dag/ ma
[zil ]@#// la'ang g.yam pa dang/ sring mo la'ang g.yas pa mthong na/ byang chub sems dang sA 'jisnyam du sems te/ kye ma'i 'jig rten gnas pa 'di dag ni 'phags pa
ma yin pa 'dus pa ste// mu cor sna bas yongs su gang zhing ngo tsha ma shes pas yongs sugang nga/ 'di ltar ma'i rum mngal gyi nang na'adug 'dug ste/ de nyid kyi mngal gyi sgo nas byang la/ de ni
tsha dang yang lhan cig du 'dod pa sten par byed pa lta ga la srid// mngal gtsagan ldan tsage du 'dug 'dug pa'i sring mo dang 'du zhing 'khrug par byed pa lta ga la srid de/ kumA'osems can 'di
gyur dag na brlag go/ rnam par brlag go/ rab tu brlag ge/ 'dod chagasakyis g.yon spro'o// zhesrung gis ga ma spro'o// ga ti mug gis g.yon phyo'o// ma shes pas g.yan
sbya'o chos las nyams shing chos ma yin pa la gnas so// mi mthun pa'i chos la rab tu spyod do// semA can domyal ba spyod yul pa'o// dud 'gro' gnasaspyod yul pa'o//
gshin 'i 'jig rten spyod yul pa'o// log pa'i lam la spyod yul pa'i snyam mo// gzhon nu'adi lta ste/ dparan wa dur khrod kyi mthar g.yad sa chen po dang lta ba zhigan mtshan
mo khyos gtsas nas/ g.yangs chen pa nas lhung bde bzhin du/ gzhon nu sems can 'di dog kyang lnga dang 'dra'o// gzhon nu'adi lta ste/ dperanadamus long khyis gtses
gtsang ba la skyed yulabaste/ gzhon nu khye ma'od bzhin dusems can 'di dag kyang phag dang 'dra ste rit+tare ma yin/ de nyid sring mo yin na/ de chung mar pa lta ga la srung snyam ste/
sems can nyon mongs pas g.yon spyob dang/ bdud kyi phyogs kyi spyod yul ba dang/ bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang/ 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba de dag gi 'dod pa thams
cad spang ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhon nugazhan yang byang chub sems dpas sgrub pa
ltas bsgribs pa'i sems can 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa mthong na/ skye mched drug la chags shing zhen pa/ mag gsagazugs mthong na mtshan mar 'dzin par 'gyur zhing mngon
rtags su 'dzan pa dang/ rna bas sgra/ snas dri/ lcasaro/ lus kyi rig pa la ' gnas amtshan mar 'dzan cing mngon rtags su 'dzan pa'i myur to/ 7mabasems can 'di dag ni khang
khro bsang zhing phanatshan ma mdza' ste/ dedag danored pa'i phyir na 'dza' bor yang mashes/ gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ni gcig la gcig gsod do// kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni
gnyid dang rmugs pa mang ba ste/ zhacing sbyong la mashes pa'i ling tog gsakhebs shing ma de ga ba'o// la ma'i sems can 'di dag ni 'gyod pas kun nas
bskor ba sta/ glo buracu nyin mongs pas sems kun nas nyon mongs pa'o// byama'o sems can 'di dag ni the tshom gyis yongs su dkris pa// chos zab mo la nges par ma gyur pa ste/
de dag gi sgrib pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'ajug go/ gzhan nu gzhan yang byang chub sems
rgyu dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis non pa/ cha ba'i nga rgyalargyus non pa/ ngargyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis non pa/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ mngon pa 'di rgyal sa non pa/ cung
zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ log pa'i nga rgyal gyis nonapa/ dma' skabs bdag laDa par sems pa// mtshangs pa pas kyang bangag chas lhag par lta ba de dag gzugs 27
bdagaces khas len pa nas/ rnam par shes pa'i ser la bdagaces khas len pa/ khong du ma chud pa khod duchud snyam du shes pa/ gus par smra bar 'os pa la gus par ma smra ba/
phyag bya bar 'os ba la phyag ma 'tshal ba/ rgan pa dang gzhon pa la ma'idud pa/ blumal mi ge ma byed pa/ mkhas pa la dge ba gang/ mi dge ba gang/ bsten par phyi ba gong/
5/ bsten par ma bya ba gang/ bya ba gang/ ma bya ba gang/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa ga/ kha na ma tho ba med pa gang/ lam gang ting nge 'dzamigang/ rnam par grol ba gang zhes ma'idri/
ba dang/ bdag nyid la bdag ni gtso bo// bdag ni mchog go snyam du rlom sems su muk+kong// 'daltar nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyi'i chos bstan to zhes sems can
rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug ga 'on tu kun ya nga byang chub sems dpas sred pa'i bcad bas bcings pa/ sred pas 'khol bu chung ma dang//
bu pho dang/ bu mas zin pa/ gnod pas phrani pa/ den med pasazan pa/ 'khar nagatan pas zin pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig
rten gyi lam gyis zin pa/ srid pa'i b.rung pas zan pa/ rung zhum med pa// rang dbang med pa'i sems can mthung 'u/ dadagarang nyam dang/ rang dbang dang/ gang du duga' bar 'agro ba dang/
mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyi'i chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug ge/ gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems
dbas dge ba'i bshesaganyen dang phral ba/ sdog pa'i grogs pas 'khor ba de dag stagapa 'grigs pos non pas ma dge ba'i lam la chags pa'i dalta ste/ srog gcod pa dang/ matsan par
len pa dang/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang/ brdzun du sa ba dang/ phra ma dang/ ngag rtsub pa dang chog pastsal pa dang/ rnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/
log par lta ba'i sems can mthong na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsdu ba dang/ mi dge ba'i las las bablug pa dang/ dge ba bcu'i sa kyi las ya ngadag par bzung ste/ sprod
nga ra bya ba'i phu'i chos ston to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug ga/ gzhon nu bgazhan yang phyung chub sems dang sa gti mug gsal
bsgribs pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun gnag gi lang tog gas kun tu bsgribs pa da bdag dang/ sems can dang/ sreg dang/ skyo ba pa dang/ bshang las skyes pa dang/ shed bu dang/
skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang/ byed pa po dang/ tshor ba pa dang/ ngar 'dzin pa dang/ nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon bar gas pa 'a mas can ma thob na/ de dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig
rtswa rnam par sbyang zhing/ lta bar gyur pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpas 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can mthong na/ da dag phung po lnga'i gshed ma sa rab tu thar pa ra bya ba dang/ 'khor ba'i 'brog dgen pa las rab tu dbang
[ze]/ ba dang/ khams gsum thams cad las gden pa'i phyir chos bstan te zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go// gzhon nu gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpas sems can 'khrugs par gyur pa/rtswa mun dza dang/ bal ba dza lta bu ma drang ba drang ba ltar 'chos pa/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rolatu/ 'jig
rten pha rol nas 'dzamig rten 'dir kun tu rgyug cing 'khor ba/ 'gro ba ltar 'gro ba la phyogs pa// mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba la phyir bltas pa mtheng na/ de dag ga mya ngan las 'da'
ba' sgo dbya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snyang rje chen po 'jug go/ gzhon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi khams
mthungan/ rnam pa bcu bo 'di dog gisasnying rje chen po 'jug go/ bsam pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po da 'ang g.yo med par 'jug go/ lhag pa'i bsam pa las shin tu byung ba'i
phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang mnyam par 'ajug go/ lam lasazung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang drang pa bcos ma ma yin par 'jug ga 3sams rgya med pa'i sems la ni/
gnas pa las byung pa'i pa de'i gang rje chen po de'ang bya rgyu med par 'jug go/ 'di lta ste// sems can thams cad la 'dud pa dang/ phyag 'tshalab las shin tu byang ba'i phyir de'i
snying rje chan pa de'ang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go/ 'a dalta ste/ bdag gi sems yongs su dag pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen pa'i ng pha sel
rjes su bsrungs bar 'jug go/ 'di lta ste/ g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i sems dang bral ba rab tu gnas pa'i sems las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'anga shes rab rtan paru'ajug
go 'di lta ste/ pha rol la bde ba spyani pa las rab tu byung pa'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de'ang bdag ga bde pa gtod par 'jug go/ brtson 'grus brtan pa las 'batu byang ba'i nadi'i
snying rjen po de'ang sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer bar 'jug ste/ gzhon nu 'daltar byungachub sems dang 'a snyaderdzachen pan rnam pa 'di dag dang gzhan yang rnam pa brgyus/ po lta
nu'adiltar gang la la thegar chen pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos 'byung// de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o// sbyin pa byed pa dang tshul khur sa
byed pa dang/ bzod pa byed pa dang/ brtson 'grus byed pa dang/ bsam gtan byed pa dang/ shes rab byad nga ni snying rje chen po ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen ra zhes bya 'o/ sa
bar gzhag pa byed pa dang yang dag par sbyong ba byed pas snying rje chen po'o// dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ mchog du dga'/
[z]7 bar bya ba'i las dang/ mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ dge ba bcu' las kyi lam dang/ tshig de dag thams cad kyis rgyas par bya'o// snyang rje chen pa ni rang byung ga yi
shes sgrub par byed pas na/ de'i phyir snying rje chen bo zhes bya'o// rang gi bya ba dang/ legs par byed pa bya ba dang/ mar gyur ba'i rtsa ba dang/ sems M can thams cad la bya ba ci
yod snyamo pa ste/ de'i snying rje chen po de'ang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/
snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen pa snyang rjed dang ldan pas sems can 'da'adra ba'i gnas thob pa mthong na de dag la snyang brtse ba dang/ snying rjeba'asems
skyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang dag pa'i chos rnams dran pa dang/ rjes su dran pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ dad pa dang/ rab tu
dga' ba dang/ dge ba'i chos la ma zhum pa dang/ ma 'gongab dang/ yongs su ma skyo ba dang/ ma dga' ba thams cad spyod pa dang/ chos thams cad la dga' bar gnas pa dang/
sems rab tu dga' ba dang/ lus rob tu tsham pa dang/ blo rab tu dga' ba dang/ yadi rab tu mgu ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par dga' zhing mos pa dang/
[zs; ]@#// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan kun tu tshol ba la dga' po dang/ chos nyan pas yongs su ma skye zhing dga' ba dang/ chos kyi phyir 'brang ba'i nan tan la rab tu
dga' ba dang/ rab tu dga' ba'i chos la mgu ba dang/ sems can rnams la khong khro ba med pa dang 1 byang chub la dga' ba dang/ chos rgya chan nga la mos pa dang/ 'ba'i theg pa
sel ba'i sems skyed pa dang/ ser sA tshar gcod pa dang/ slong ba la dga' ba dang/ gtong ba la rab tu dga' ba dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dag sdud tsang byams pa dang/
tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rtag tu dad pa dang/ bdag ga tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ngan 'gro dang 'jigs pa thams cad las rang tu dag2por dbugs 'byin pa la rab tu dga' ba
ts+tshA dang pha rol ngan du zer ba dang/ ngan pa ra brjod pa'i tshig nag lam bzed cing rab tu dga' ba dang/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ mgo dang/ mgo bcad kyang bzod par nus te/
sems mi nyams shing rab tu dga' ba dang/ rgan rabs la 'dudatsang zhes byed pa la dga' ba dang/ rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa la dga' ba dang/ khro gnyer med cing gsong por smra ba la des 'a
ba dang/ tshul 'chos pa dang/ kha gsag dang/ gzhogs slongs med pa la rab tu dga' kha dang/ snying po dang ldan pa'i chos la 'jug par rab tu dga' ba dang/ byang chung
sems dpa' la ston pa bzhin du 'phangs pa dang/ chos la bdag bzhin du 'phangs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sreg bzhan du 'phangs pa dang/ bla ma la pha ma bzhin du 'bangs
pa dang/ sems can thams cad la bu bzhin du 'phangs pa dang/ slob dpon la mig bzhin du 'phangs pa dang/ nan tan yan lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du 'phangs pa dang/ pha rol
tuphyin pa'i ka ba dang rkang pa bzhin du'ang ngas pa dang/ chos smra ba la rin pa che thams cad bzhin du 'phangs pa dang/ chos yongs su tshol ba lasman bzhin du 'phangs pa dang/ skul
zhing dran par byed pa la sman pa bzhin du 'phangs par sems pa'o// gzhon nu 'di ni dga' ba zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba de la rab tu gnas
nas rtag tu chos tshol b.larab tu dga' bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa la mi skye'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms
gangazhin/ btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhen/ 'dalta ste/ nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa dang/ bdag dang gzhan rjesasu srung ba'i
btang snyoms pa dang/ dus dang dus ma yin par btang snyoms pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa'i btang snyoms pa gang zhe na/ gang bkur sti byas kyang mthor mi
sems pa dang/ bkur sti ma byas kyang dma' bar ma sems pa dang/ rnyed pas sems pa med pa dang/ ma rnyed pas ya ma'achad pa dang/ tshul
khrims dang ldan m dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la bye mnyam pa dang/ grags pa la dga' ba med pa dang/ ma grags pa la zhum pa med pa dad/ smad pa la ya ma sod pa dang/
bstod pa lachos nyid du shan tu gnas pa dang/ sdug bsngal laso sor rtogs pa'i stobs dang/ bde ba la ma rtag par rtog ra 'i stobs dang/ rjes su chags pa 'dor ba/
dang leng khro ba spong ba dang/ mdza' ba dang ma mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang/ legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa la gnyis su ma byed pa dang/ sdug pa ngang masdug pa mi

lta ba dang/ bsnyen bkur byed pa dang bsnyen bkur ma byed pa la dga' ba dang mi dga' bar bya ba med pa dang/ snyan par sab dang ma snyan par smra ba la rjes su chags pa dang khong khrob med pa dang/ kun
ts+tshA myang ba'i nyes pa la mtshungs par yongs su 'jal ba dang/ bdag dang sems can gzhan la bsam pa mnyam pa dang/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba dang/ sems can rab 'bring tha mal 'od
zor mnyam pa dang/ bsags pa dang mibasngags pa lachos nyidi mnyam pa dang/ bdonapa dang ma bden pa la bdagag bden pa yongs su dag pa ste/ gzhon nu'adi ltar gang bdag la gnod pa
byed pa de la byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin no/ da la bdag dang gzhan rjes su srung ba'i btang snyoms gang zha na/ gang yan lag dang nying lag gsha bcad kyang
btang snyoms pa yan no// yan lag dang nying lag ga sha bcad kyang 'dod pa mad cing rtsol ba med de btangasnyoms pa yin no// lus kyang ma 'gyur dag kyang ma 'gyur te/ gnyis
ka bzod pas de'i phyi'i btang snyoms zhes bya'o// mig gi rnam pas ma yin/ gzugs kyi rnam pas ma yin te/ gnyis kas kyang mi phyin pa nas/ yid kyi rnam pa dang
chos kyi rnam pa'i bar gyis rna ma phyin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// ma ma phyin cing snang ba med pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// rma phyung ba la rma mi 'byin pas de'i phyir
btang snyoms zhes bya'o// bdag dang pha rol gnyis las bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms zhes bya'o// phan par byed pa dang phan par ma byed pa la mnyam par sbyar bas de'i phyi'i
btang snyoms zhes bya'o// btang snyoms ni rtsod pa med pa lhun byed pa'o// btang snyoms ni rang gi sems nges par rtog pa'o// btang snyoms ni bdag la so sor rtog pa'o//
ba tang snyoms na gzhan la gnod pa med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms na mnyam par bzhag pa'i dngos po ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la btang sems pa gnang bar ma mdzad do// de ci'i phyi'i zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu 'bad par bya'o/
rtag pa rargyun ma chad par dag pa yongs su btsal ba la brtson par bya ste/ dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o// de la dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom
pa gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ snod ma yin pa'i sems can la btang snyoms pa dang/ bsnyen bkur ma byed pa la btang snyems pa dang/ ma rnyed pa dang/ smad pa dang/ ma grags pa
dang sdug bsngal ba la btang snyoms pa dang/ nyan thos kyi thig par nges par 'gyur ba la zhugs pa rnamAbatangasnyems pa dang/ sbyin pa'i dus na tshul khrims nye bar zla ba pa
btang snyems pa dang/ tshul khrims kyadus nasbyin gnyer ba sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang/ bzodapa'i dus na sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brtso 'a khrus nye bar sgrubapabatang snyano pa dang/
tsA// brtson 'grus kyi dus na tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'jog pa btang snyems pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi dusan sbyin po'i latu phyin pa nye bar slob par btang snyoms pa dang/ shes rab kyajug/
na pha sol tu phyin pa lngal dmags pa nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms bsta/ 'di ni dus dus su btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o// de ltar gang ma byi ba'i chos ma byed pa 'di ni btang snyoms
zhes bya ste/ de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad la btang snyoms su byed de// gzhon nu 'dan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i
chen bo'i sems can thams cad la byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms shes bya'o// de ltar shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen pores/
gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ gtang snyoms mdor bstan pa dang bas/ rgyas par bstan pa dang bcas te rgya cher yang dag par bastan/
te gzhon nupartson 'chos spyod pa des de thos nas pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur te// lcamasapa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms
kyile'u ste lnga pa'o// de la shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa gang zhe na/ shari'ibu pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa 'di dag nyid yin te/ gang pha rol du phyin
badrug po 'dod g la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod do// drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyis
rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzodapa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang// brtson 'grus kyi pha rolatu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de dag nas
thu// rolatu phyin pa drug rnams so/// del sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nadege sbyong dang/ bram
ze dang/ 'phongs pa rnams kyi sbyin bdag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ zas kyis 'phongs pa la zas/ skamagyisa'aphongs pa la skom/ gzhon pa dang/ gos dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng/
ba dang/ byug pa dang/ gnas dang po/ yo byad dung/ na ba'i sman dang/ mar me dang/ sa'i snyan dwang/ bran pho dang/ bran mo dang/ gser dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bi cha dang/
dung dang/ ma shel dang/ bya ru dang/ rin po che thams cad dang/ rta dang/ glang bo chedad gshangaNA dang/ skyed mos tshal dang/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang/ bu phadang/ bu mo dang/
chung ma dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ mdzod dang/ bang ba dang/ gling bzhi'irgyal po'i longs spyod kyi bde ba thams cad dang/ rtsa ba dang dga' ba thams cad dang/ lag pa dang/ rkang
pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ mag dang/ ma go dang/ sha dang/ khrag dang/ rkang dang/ sa pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi yo byad gang yang/ sring bal yongs su mgatong ba/
med do// sbyin pa de rnamapo bcas yongs su dag pas sbyin par byed do bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi mthunapa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol zhing sbyin pa
medabyang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jags shing skrag nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems/
dpa' rnams la yongs su ma btong ba la mgron du gnyer ba'i sbyin pa tshod/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams la gdong du lta zhing spyan pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lasams
can tha dad par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sams dpa' rnams la mdza' bas sbyin pa mad byang chub saMms dpa' rnams la sdong bas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnamA
la zhing tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can thams cad la sbyin gnas ma yin zhes yangs shing sbyin pamed de/ shA 'bu byang chub sems dpa'i
spyin pa rnam pa de btsus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/ gzhan yang shA'i bu byang chub sems dpa' spyan pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed
do bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dod cing sbyin pa mod/ bya chub sems dapa'i rnams la bsam palag par spyanab med/ byang
byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su skyo ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar bstan nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rjesasu m dga'
ba'i sbyin pa mad/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'gyod pa la sman pa med/ byang chub sems dpaN+Da rnams latshul mas nga ldan pa la bkur te sbyin pa/
med tshulakhrims 'chal pa'i brnyas te sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lo rnam par sman pa la ri ba'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i rnam
pa banus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na
byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smad nas sbyin nga med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzhan du phyogs nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dapa' rnams la nyon mongs shang
sbyin pa medu/ khro ba dang/ phrag dog dang/ gnod sams ston tsang sbyin pa med/ rwamoram byed par sbyin pa med (rang gi lag nas ma yin par spyan pa med/ ji tsam du sprugs pa/
los dbri zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams skye ba 'dod cing sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bzhus yongs su dag par sbyan par
gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa banus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams la ma brtan par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshod 'dzin cing spyin pa mad/ yongs su chad par sbyin pa med/ gzhan ny+tsa dring 'jog ste sbyin pa med/ nyung zhes
cung khrodatsam sbyin pa mod/ gzugs dang/ longs spyod dang/ dbang phyug la mngon pa dga' ba'i spyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brgya byin dang/ tshas pa dang/
'jig rten skyong ba dang/ ltar skye ba thams cad 'dod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sngo zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams la mkhas pas smad pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams cad mkhyen par ma bsdus pa'i sbyin pa med de/ shA'a'i bu byang chub sams dpa'i sbyin pa rnam
yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa do gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu/
gang zhen/ jatsam 'dus byas las nges par 'byung ba dang/ 'dus ma byas thob par bya ba'i phyir de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu
thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ bza' bo byin ngas tshe dang/ spobs pa dang/ bde ba dang/ stobs dang/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// btung ba
byin pas nyon mongs pa dang/ srid pa thams cad bsal ba phunasum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// bzhon pa byin ra sa bde ba thams cad kyi dngas pa phun sum
shatshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// bgo ba byin pas khrel yodapa dang/ ngo tsha shes pa dang/ gser ltar khadog yodas su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// sngos dang
'a 'phreng ba byin pas tshul khrims dang/ thos pa dang/ ting nge 'dzan gyi dro dang phyug pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ba// dri rab tu zhim pa'i sngos dang/ phyi ma dang/ byug pa byin
kyipas lus kyi nan tan gyi dri zhim pa phun sum tshogs pa ba tu 'thab po// 'o byin pas 'bri ba'i nangan mchog gi ro de nga'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan phun sumatshogs par ba tu 'bab bo// gnas/
byin pas sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang/ rten dang/ gling dang/ skyabs dang/ dpung gnyen phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob po// nad pa la sman byin pas/ ma rgas/
so'achi/ shi ba med pa'i bde ba yongs su rdzogs pa phun su tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// yo byad sna tshogs byon pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi yod byad yongs sugs pa phun/
sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/ shA'i 'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na/ sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur la/
gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ldan yin gazhan bcu rab tu 'thab bo// bdu gang zhe na/ 'di lta[W ]/ mar me phyin pas zhi ArANatags pa'i spyan pa yongs su
dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// sI'i snyan byin pas lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// gser dang/ nor bu dang/ utig dang/ pi smad ng
dung dang/ man shel dang/ bya ru dang/ rin po che thams cad phyin pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshog r tsA pa rab tu 'thob bo// rin
po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang/ ma tog sna tshogs byin pas dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yodasasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thopa ba// rta dang/ glang po che dang/ shing rta/
byin pas rgyas pa dang/ yangs pa dang/ cha ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// skyed mos tshal dang/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal byin pas bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar/
pa dang/ tung ba'adzani dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob po// nor dang/ 'bru dang/ mdzod dang/ bang pa byin pas chos ni po che thams
cad kyi mdzod yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'theb de// branapa dang/ bran mo dang/ las byed pa'i ma byon pas/ rang nyams dang/ rang dbang dang/ rang byung gi
bya@#// ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ba/ bu pho dang bu me byan pas mdza' ba dang/ stag pa dang/ 'dod pa'i bla na med pa yang/
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thobage// gling bzhi'i rgyal po 'alongs sbyod thams cad phyin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa'i
mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob ste/ shA'i bu phan yon rnam pa bcu po de dag yongasasu bzung bar 'gyur go//
shar 'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar spyan yabyin dz+hAn yon gzhan yang bcu 'thob bo//bcugapazhe na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga byin pas tshul khrims dang/
tang pa 'dzan dang/ shes rab dang/ rnam par grolapa dang/ rnam par u0f7cgrol pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob pa// dga' pa'i rtsed mo
thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pas dam pa'i chos kyi dga' badang/ rtsa ba yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs par ba du 'thob bo// rkang pa byin pasachos kyi don gyi rkang pa byang chub
kyi snying por 'gro ba yongasasu rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// lag pa byin pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi lag par ba tu sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa na/
sum tshogs pa rab tu 'theb bo// rna ba dang sna byan pas dbang po ma tshang ba med cing yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// yan lagadang tung lag byin pas
kha na ma tho ba medacing mdzes pa'i yan lag sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// mag byin pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi mig mi sgrub pa/
yongs su dag pa phunasum tshogs par ba tu 'thob bo// sha dang khrag byin bas sems can thamasacad kyilus dang srog snying po med pa las snying po len pas nye bar 'tshob lamakhas pa phun
sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// rkang byan pas nordza ltar mashagasu pa'i lus theb pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo// yan lag gi dam pa mgo byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum gyi mchogathun med cing lhaganamed pa'i thams cad mkhyenapa' ya shas khong du chud pa yongs su tshogs pa phun sum tshogs partsa ba du 'thobasta/ shar 'i bu byang chub
sams dpa' khyang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa'i phan yond dug yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu byang
chub sems dpa' makhas pa zab pa shes rab kyi snang ba na/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa/ 'dud rtsi 'dod pa// sang pa 'dod/
/ byang chub 'dod de/ yang shwara'i bu mya ngan las 'dasaba'aded pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/ 'dzag rten gyi zang sbrang sbyin pa nad
'dzag rten gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba gang yang med do// 'dilta ste/ shar 'i bu khyim bdag chun pa zhing skam la gnas nius ba glang dang/ gnam sdod ma yin pa'i zhing ga rma
bsko rdzogs par byas te sa bon btab nas/ rnam grangs 'das gshol gyis 'tshabs gser dang dngul yang 'khrul ba// dngos pa sna tshogs gzhan yang 'grub bo// datsa'i phyir zhe na/
shar 'i'u 'bru dang mtshus pa'i nor med do// shA ra'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'atshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang chod yodad// 'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu bas nam skam po dang gsher ba zos pa dang/ chusrung mo dang dran po 'khrungs
pa de las 'o ma 'khrubaste/ zhodadu/ mar gsar dang/ mar gyi snang pe'ang 'grub bo// shA ra'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chad ra bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing byanan/ da ma'adod kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang yongs su 'grub bo// brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i ng 'grub bo//
gnas de gsum yongs su grub nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yongs su 'grub bo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcudang sa 'jigs pa bzhi'ang yongasasu
'grub bo// las stong gis grub pa'i sangs rgyas chos ma'adres pa bco brgyad rnams kyang yongs su 'grub bo// las stong gsa'akhrub pa'i rnam padrug cu dang
ldan pa'i dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa'i ng yongs su 'grub bo// las brgyas grub pa'i skyes bu chen pa'i mtshan gcig yongs su 'grub bo// las nyis brgyas grub
pa'i gtsug tor skye bar 'grub bo// rnam pa dang yon tan brgyas yongs su rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung chen po'ang 'grub bo// mdabye bdang yon tan brgya
phrug stong dang ldan pa'i tshams kyi 'phreng ba thags bzang pa/ phrugamed pa/ snyams shang dkar ba'ang yongs su 'grub ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi 'bras bu rnam par sman bsa mngon par 'grub bo// yang shA ra'i bu gang byams pa'i sems bskyed nas/ slongs la sbyin pa phyin pa de ni gang+gA'i klung
gi phyi ma snyed du sems bskyed bas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rgyun mi 'chad pa gtsaga'agrub ste/ ting nge 'dzanidi la gnas nias/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ba spu'i bu ga pa de nas ting nge 'dzani brgya gang+gA'i klung gi rgyun ltar mngon par sprul pa mdzad de/ shAsi'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni
'phrul gyi bya ba thams cad ' dbang 'thob pa'o// shAri'i bu gang 'dalta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegos pa ston byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pan/ 'dzag
rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pas yongs su bzung ba yin no// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ma 'chi ba 'dod pa dang/ byang chub 'dod pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod dag 'jig
( rten gyi khrang thang rgyun par byed do// shA ra'ibu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten zang thang la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sbyang
chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ga par gyis shig/ shA ra'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa/ shin du grungs med pa// chad med
pa bsamagyis mi khyab pa gang byung ba de'i tshe de'i dusan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chos mes zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan b/
bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa// lha dang ma rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo////
00/ yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshes mes kyi tshakatshad nas stong phrag bcur gyur to// yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'chos mos de'i dag slong stong phrag
brgya ni dgra bcom pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas/ sems kyidabang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar du ste/ dgra bcom pa sha stag
'dus pa chen pa byang ngo// bya ba'i bu pa tsho tha ga pa zhes bya ba thags 'thag pa// gzugs bzang ba// mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa// mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i
mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshes mos gangan bzhugs pa'i sa phyogasadi nas ha cang yang mi ring ba'i sa phyogs zhag na rang gi las byed do// de nyin par las byas nas
nub kar khyim du 'gro ba'i tsho rtag tu dus thams cad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'chos ms de'i drung du 'ongs nas/ ras kyi kha tshar gcig 'bul zhing 'daskad ces gsol/
bcom ldan 'das bsdu ba'i gnas kyis bdag bcom ldan 'das lanas kyi kha tshar phul ba'i dge ba'i sa bdas/ bdag ma 'ong pa'i dus na bsdu ba thams cad dang ldan pa 'di bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur tsag cas des rim gyis ras kyi kha tshar stong lnga brgya yul to/ des bskal pa bya bo phrag bcoltar ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma
song ngo// dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal khabya ba phrug stong myong ngo// de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis brgya byan gyi bdag po bya phrag stong myong ngo// dag
ba'i rtsa bo 'jam pa/ yid du 'od pa dang/ dang po'i las danyid kyis sangs rgyas bya ba phrag stod mnyes par byas te/ des thams cad lame tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng ba
dang byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ chos gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bodon dang/ gos dang/ zhal zas dang/ mal cha dang/ na ba'i gsas sman dang/ yopyad
kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ na mor byas nas mchod do// de phyis paskal pa grangs med pa zhig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas nas/ rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomang yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jagi rten du byung ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya
pa'i bar du ste/ de la bye ba phrag nyi shu'i sa' ngu gnas so// de'i dgra bcom pa byeb khrag khrig phrag nyi shu zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas/
sems kyi dbang thamasacad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i bar gyi nyan thesa'adus pa chen po byungang// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag lnga'adi dran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub l bkod do// des chos bstan te sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i don byas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// der bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'dus/
nas la stong gi bar du dam pa'i chos gnas so// de'i sku gdung yang rgyas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu nga du yongs su myangs bar 'gyur ba'i bzhin no// shA/
pa'i bu ras kyi kha tshur 'bul ba dang sems bskyed pas kyang/ mthar gyisasangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa la ltas/ shar 'i bu sems na rtsa che'i/ sbyin pa ni ma yin no//
shA ri'i bu gal te sbyin pa rgya che lasems kyis ma yanan sbyin bdag rtsub mo zhes bya ba ltar 'gyur te/ des sbyin pa de nyid byin yang sems yongs su ma sbyangs so// shA ra'i bu 'jig
rten gyi zang zid la gnasate/ thams cad yongs su thebab gyur pa la ltos/ shAri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pan spyi na pa nyung yang mang par byed de// ye shes kyisipA
kyisalhag par byed do// shes rab kyi stobs kyis rgyas par byed do// bsngo ba'i stobs kyis dpag tu med par byed do/// de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyasaron de rgya cher
rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'atsho tshagasasu bcad pa 'di deg gsungs so// gzugs 'dod phyir na sbyin pa sbyin ma khyod// longs spyod mtha se'adod phyir ma yin gyi// bla na med pa'i
sangs rgyas mchog 'dod pa na// de phyir sbyin pa chung yang du mar 'gyur// grags dang brjod pa dag dang sgra dag dang// g.yog dang bde ba nam yang ma 'dod
cing 'chi 'pho skyo ba kun kyang ma 'dod de// de phyir sbyin tung 'bras bu chen po 'gyur// zas dang skom dang chos gos gang byan pa// srid pa'i 'gro ba 'dod phyir ma yin te/ sbyin
pas 'chi ba med pa'i sgo btsal phyir// des ni sku rtse tsamo yang sbyin pa sbyin// 'phyar ba med cing khengs pa med par 'gyur// g.yo dang ser sna dgan thams cad sbyang// de dag
le la nam yang yod min te/ de ltar de dag 'jig rten phan phyir spro// rgyal po srid dang nor dang 'bru srog gtong// de dag sems na gzhan du ma'agyur te// byin nas dga' ba chen
pa spyod par 'gyur// sbyin zhing gtong la byang chub rnyed ma dika'// pha dngam dang bun sdug pa ltar/ srung ba 'jig rten kun la de bzhin te/ gang gis byang chub spyod mchogaspyad m
rnams// sbyin tshe rtag tu phrag dog med par 'gyur// de dag mthong nas ma khru ste// jaltar sngon gyi bzhin du sna// ma mdza' dug dang rtag mdza' zhing// skya ga pa rnams la 'dzagi
mad smin // de la dngas po gang yod pa// slong ba la rna bsrab med// chos 'dod par ni rtag 'gyur te// rgyal srid 'dod par ma'agyur ro// 'byung bar rtagatusu byed cing// chos kyi sbyin pa'i ng
sbyin par byed// 'dod la brkam pa ma gtog par/su zhigargyal spyod 'dod par 'gyur//'dod pa'i rgyal sridim redatsad mtho ba'i bde ba 'dod ma yin// sangs rgyas byang chub yongasal zhing// grags pa
chen po sbyin pa sbyin// bdag dang nor rdzas gzhan dag kyang// mang pa myur du gtong ba ni// de dag byang chub dam pa'i mchog/ nam yang gti par ma 'gyur ro// mkhas pa/
gzugs nim 'dod de// longasaspyodadug kyang 'dod ma yin// mtho ris dag kyang de 'dod// mya ngan 'da' ba'ang 'dod ma yin// lam shes lamal mkhas pa gang//
gang dag bshes par gyur pa la// rten pa dag tu ma byed de// srid pa med pa 'dod par 'gyur// shA ra'i du 'di na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o/
dgu pa// de la gang la brtson pa sa byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin ba grang
zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di gsum na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi legs par spyod pa ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang/ yid
kyis legs par spyod pa'o/// del lus kyis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/ 'ad la shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nasrog gcod pa spangs pa yon/
ma byin par len pa sbyangs pa yin/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin te/ 'di ni lus kyisilegs par spyod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shwa'i bu byang chub sems dpa' na de rdzun
du smra ba spangs pa yi/ phra ma dang/ ngag rtsub pa dang/ tshigabakyal pa spangs pa yin te/ 'dazhi dag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang shA ra'i bu byang chub sems dang
na brnab sems mdu/ gnod sems med tsang/ yang dag par lta ba yin te/ 'di na yod kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o// de 'di snyam du sems te/ lus
kyis legs par spyod pa gang/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa gang/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa gang yan snyam mo// de'ang zad snyam du sems te/ lus kyi las gang srog gcod/
ba dang/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa ma byas pa de na lus kyis legs kharaspyod bzhes bya'o snyam m/ del ngag gis legs par sdud pa gang zhe na/ de 'di
! snyam du sams te/ ngag galas gang brdzun du sa ba dang/ phra ma dang/ ngagadzul pa dang tshag bkyal pa ma sbas pa de ni ngeg gsalegs par spyod pa zhes bya'o snyam mo// de la yid kyis/
[c/]legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/ de la 'dasnyam du sems te/ yid kyis gang brnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta bam byas pa de na yadikyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o
lhamamo// de 'di ltar tshul bzhinas sor rtog ste/ las gang lus kyis ma byas pa dang/ las gang ngag dang yade kyage ma byas pa de rtse gdags par nus sam/ de'adi ltar tshul bzha
gyis rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/ las gang lus las ma byas pa dang/ lag gang ngag dang yid kyis ma byas pa de sngon pe 'am/ ser pa 'am/ dmar pa 'am/ dka'apa'i m/
le brgan nam/ shel gyi kha dog tu gdags par ma nus te/ mag gas shel pa bya ba ma yin/ rnyi las shes parub ba ma yin/ snyas shes par bya ba ma yin lces shes par
bya ba ma yani/ lus kyis shes par bya ba ma yan/ yid kyis shes par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de na spyis pa ma yan/ bskyed pa ma yin//
byang ba ma yin/ zan pa ma yin te/ de nalas gang gis kyang shes par bya ba ma yin no// de 'di snyam du sems te/ tshul khrims de ni ganga mngon par 'dus ma byas
pa'o/ gang mngon par 'du ma byed pa de la gdags pa gang yang med do/ de gang gdags pa med pa de la bdag mngon par chags par ma bya'o snyam nas/ de 'di ltar legs par sbyad
dpa'i tshul khrims kyang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong// gang gatshul khrims de dang/ tshul khrims de gang du bsngo ba de'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong
ngo de de ltar mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba gang gis tshul khrims sam/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la so sor rtog par 'gyur ba'i 'jig tshogs la lta bam slong ngo// de de ltar
mthong ngas sdom pa dang/ cho ga dang/ spyod pa dang/ spyod yul shes bzhin du spyod par 'gyur te/ shes bzhin du spyod pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// de bdag
tu dmigs shang ma spyod/ pha rol dudamagasashAng sdod de/ de tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang/ tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin pa yin no// bdag tu dmagasan tshul khrims
su dmags par 'gyur gyi/ gang bdag tu mi dmags pa de na tshul khrims su ma dmigs so// gang tshul khrims su ma dmags pa de ni bslab pa nyams lab ma byed de// gang
bslab pa nyam par ma phyed pa de tshul khrims nyams par ma byed do/ tshul khrims mchog tu ma 'dzin to// de ci'i phyi'i mchog tu ma'adzanAca na/ des gzhan lasachos thamasacad shes so//
gzhan gang yin pa de la bdag med do// gang bdag med pa de la ci zhig yongs su gzung bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'adusakyis de'atsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag/
gsungs so// lus kyis dag cadi ngag gis dag pa dang// yid kyis dag cing rtag tu stod pa dag/ dag pa brtul zhugs la ni rtag gnas pa// de ni byang chub sems dba'
tshul khrims ldan// shin tu bzang po'i las lam bcu po 'ad ]/gang dag srung ba byang chub sems dpa' mkhas// lus dang ngag dad yad kyis gang ma byas// da na mkhas pa tshul
khrims ldan zhes bya// gang dag ma byas ma bskyed ma len pa// de la kha dog med tsang dbyibs kyang med// gang la kha dog medatsang dbyingasamed pa// dal gdags pa nam yang ma dmigs
sa rtag tu tshul khrims ma byas 'dus ma byas// de namag gas blta bar mi nus te// rna ba sna dang lce yis shes ma yin// lus dang yid kyis shes par byas yani// gang de dbang pos shes
bar ma nus pa// de la snying rje 'jug pa nus ma yin// de ltar tshul khrums yongs dag mthong ba de/ nam yang tshul khrims dmags pa rtsa la gnas so// tshul khrims ldan zhes yid kyis mi
snyems shing// bdag tu 'dzan pas tshul khrims ma srung te// tshul khrims srung yang tshul khrims 'du shes med// de ni khrims ldan byang chub spyad pa spyod// 'jig tshogs la nalta ba gang
sel ba// de na lta bar nam yang ma 'gyur ro// gang la lta med de la gnas med de// tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims dam snyams// chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa kun srung ba// de yi chog bsam du med par
'gyur//rab tu 'byung zhing ra ba tu bsrungs pa na// tshul khrims ldan te gzhan la rtse dam byed// bdag med 'du shes tshul khrims mi dmigs te// bdag med de lu tshul
khrims dmags pa'i ng med// bdag dang de bzhin tshul khrims gang sems pa// rtag tu 'dzegs pa'i mtha' zhes ngas bshad do// bdag med sna tshul khrims masems te// bdag med//
ba tshul khrims rtos ma yin/ tshul khrims ma nyams tshul khrims mi sams te// bdag med sla po tshul khrims rtog ma yin// tshul khrims ma nyams tshul khrims skyon med pa/
pudagan tshul khrims ldan zhes maslong ngo// gang la bdag mad tshul khrims 'adu shes med// shes rab zab mo byang chub spyad pa spyod// 'jigs med gang dgatshul khrims 'adi'adrab// nam yang tshul
khrims 'al par da ma'agyur// thams cad chos ni gang dag mi dmigs pa// de yi tshulakhrims de na 'phags pas bsngags// byas ba gang dag bdag tu lha gnas te// bdag ni tshul khrims
ldan zhes khrims srung zhing// bsrungs kyang tshul khrims 'bras bu myong bde// ngan 'gro gsum pa kun las oM thar to// gang dag bdag tu ltab kun spangs pa// de ni nga dang nga zhes ma'abyung// tshul

khrims ldan pa de la lta med de// da na phyi'i yang log ltung ma 'dzags so// 'di'adra ba ya tshul khrims la/nga shes pa// de la'achal pa'i tshul khrims l ma nus// srid pa gsum na de bdago ma mthong na/
0 khrims dang tshul 'chala mthong 'gyur skyes dgos/ shA ra'i bu de ltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub sems dba'akhasam par chos bcu 'dus par 'gyura'o// bcu gang zhe na//
dad pa'i bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang/ brtson 'grus kyi bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang/ rab tu 'dun ba dad/ las kyi rnam par s+san pargya chon pa la dad pa dang/ 'bags
pa la ldang ba byed pa dang/ bla ma la rim gro byed pa dang/ slob dpon lakhasnyen bkur byed ra dang/ chos tshol ba la 'jug par byed pa dang/ byang chub yongs su tshol zhing lus
dang srog la malta bar byed pa dang/ shA ri'i bu daltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam par chos bcu pa de dag 'dus par 'gyur ro// de chos bcu po de dag la kha
du gnas nas/ dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag par sgrub po// dge ba'i chos gang zhe na/ 'di ltasu/ legs par spyod pa gsum pa 'di dag nyid de/ lus dang//
ngag dang/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o// legs par spyod pa gsum po de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub samA dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de nyida'i tshe byang chub gang dang/ 'bral
ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi sa kyi rnam grangs yongasasu tsholal// 'das de'i chos nyid na'adi yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas dag gis
bsngags pa yi// dge ba'i las rnams lus kyis byed// gang las thos pa red 'gyur ba'i// slob dpon la ni rim gro byed// sems can thams cad don
gyi phyir// byams pa'i sems ldan phrag dog med// chos las brtsams te gangajag la// ra midagan btu byed// ngag ni shin tu sdom gyur te// de ni masnyan tshig ma sgra/ 'di
ni bdun dang ldan pa'i mtshan// nam du'ang ngagartsub ma sna'o// yade ni dag ba'i yid du 'gyur// nam du'ang sdig pa mi 'dod de/ khyamasasems gus dang bcas pa yi// bsam
panyid kyis rtag tu lta// rgyalabs bstan pa shes gyur nas// chos 'dra la ni gus dang bcas// chos la gus par byas pas na// myur du byang chub rnam 2tshang rgya// chos bcu pa dedas
la rab tu gnas pa 'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ byang chub sems dba' sde snodakyi chos yongs su tshol pas slob dpon la mkhre dang bsnyen bkur byed do/ tha zho chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bulal/
gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa b.ru skyed de// bcu gang zhen/ kya ma'o lus bad ni na ba ste/ khams kyi sbrul gdug par zhin du rtag
par pan tshun ma 'phrod de// sdug bsngal mang ba'o// zhes nga mang ba'o// so ba dang/ 'bras dang/ b.lamag dang/ me dbaladang/ g.yan pa dang/ zung dang/ mkhris
pa dang/ bad kan gyis gang ste nad dang 'dra/ phol mig dang 'dra/ zug rngu dang 'dra/ chu ba dang 'dra/ gnod pa dang 'dra/ g.yo ba/ 'jig pa// snying po med pa// nyam chung ba
shag shag pa/ yun thung ba/ skad cig ma// dur khrod du 'jazhi ba ste/ snying po med pa'i lus las snying po bang ngosnyam du sems bskyed pa dang po de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'/
byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la 'am gro dang bsnyenabakur byed do/ tha na chu phor gang tsam yang 'bul la// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad/
ces gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo// khams ni sbrul gdugam rungs pa// bzhi pa gcig la gcig rten te/
re rer yang na 'khrugs pa las// nad pa chen 'byung bar 'gyur// mgi nad dang nad dang/ sna nad dang ni de bzhin du// sertsod dang ni mchu nad rnams/ gzhan yang lus las 'byung
bar 'gyur// skye dang 'bras dang phol mag dang// ma dpalagayan pa rnams dang ni// nadagazhan rnams mang ba dag/ lus lasasu ni 'byung bar 'gyur// lus 'di nad dang mtshus
sa ste// lus ni 'brum bu 'dra ba'o// lus 'di gnod pa 'dra ba ste// yun thung skad cag 'dug pa'o// dur khrod du ni 'gro zhing 'jagi/ ma rtog ma brtan g.yo ba ste//
rab tu 'jigacing na ba dang// lus 'adi rnag gis gang bas// shag shag pa dwang yun thung ba/ rnag gsagang ba'i lus 'adi yis// sangs rgyas kyi ni sku
ya tha'i// dag pa'i las rnams bsgrub par bya// thams cad du ni rab rngag pa// rnagags gang ba'i lus 'das// chos sku bsam gyis mkhyab la// sangs rgyas kyan sku'agrub
bo[ï¼š]gang na gzhan gyis thob med pa// da'adra'ilus ni thob par bya// tsha ba dag kyang gang sgrub dang// bsal bdag kyang rab srungs pa// lus 'di yang ni rga ba dang//
'chib dag gi gzhom par 'gyur// gang dag gang dang tsha bzod pa// lus kyis su ni thams cad du// skyes bu'i bya ba byed pa yi// mchog gi lus na thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten/
grags pa'i bla ma la// ramigro dag ni rab bya ste// sang pa med pa lus las su// stong pa dag nublangs par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu sams bskyed pa dang po 'di bskyed nas// byang chub
sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grungs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed pa de tha na chu gang tsam yang 'bul lo/
gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems skyed de/ kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ rtag tu 'dral ba dang/ bkru ba dang/ mnyib dang/ 'jig pa dang/ 'gyis
0 pa dang/ dbral ba'i chos can no// shA ra'i bu'adal ste/ dper nadza tsam du rdza mkhan gyis bum pachung tshad dang tshe tshad byas pa thams cad kyang mthar 'jig go/ de bzhin du kye ma'o
lus 'dabang sang pa med pa// so ma btang ba'i skad bzhin te mthar 'jig pa'o// shA ra'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na shang ga yal ga'i 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu ji snyed
pa de thams cad kyang mthar ltung bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du ku ma'olus 'dani snying po medang/ 'bras bu smin pa bzhin du ltung ba'i chos can no// shA ra'ibu'adi lta ste/ dper
na rtsa'i ma mo'i zal pa'i thags pa ji snyid pa de thams cad kyang nyi mas phegan ring por mi gnas so// shA ra'i bu de bzhin du kyi ma'olus 'adu nosang pa med pa ste/ zil pa'i thigs pa/
bzhunangu'ang por m gnas so// shA ri'i bu 'dulta ste/ dbar nargya mtsho chen po dang/ 'bab chu dang/ 'bab chu'i rgyun la lha ba rdos pa yod pa ji snyed padi dag thamA cad kyang song pa mdad rang
bzhin gyis nyam chud pa'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kyi ma'olus 'di naskang po med pa ste/ lbu ba rdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chud pa'o// shar 'i bu 'ad lta// dareb na chan
bab pa'i chu'i chu bur gzhan skye zhing gzhan 'gag go/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin dulus 'dan snang pa med pa ste/ chu'i chu bur ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o// de ltar snying po med pa'i
lus las stong pa byung ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa gnyis pa de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs/
su tshol bas slob dpan la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de'atshatshigs su bcad pa 'di
ngag gsungs so// ji ltar rdza ma'i mkhan po yis// sa las snod rnams byas pa dag/ de dag thams cad mthar 'jig rten// sems can srog kyang de dang 'dra// ji ltasashing
gi yal ga yi// lo ma me tog 'bras bu rnams// thams cad ltung ba'i chos can te// ma pa srog kyang de bzhinano//rtswa mchog dag ga za'i pa' thogs// nyi ma yongs su bab
pan yud tsam gyis ni med 'gyur te/ mi yi srog kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar 'bab chu'i rgyun rnams kyi// lbu ba rdos pa nyam chung ba// de ltar lus na ma chung ste// sAng
pa med pa lbu ba 'dra// ji ltar char pa bab pa yus// chu yi chu bur skyes pa yang// skad cig gis nadi 'jig 'gyur// de bzhin lus kyang snying po med// sAng po ma yin
snying po zhes// snying po stong pa ma yin 'adzan// de dag log rtog spyod yul te// snying po khong du chud ma yin// stong pa med la stong pa med// snying po snang bar shes pa nadi/
ba/ de dag yang dag rtog pa'i yul// stong pa khong du chud pa yi// snying po 'du shes byas myur to// sngagangatsamakyi chu 'bul ba// snying po med pa'i lugs las ni// snying po dag
dab/nayin par 'gyur// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa gnyid pa 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob
dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed do/ tha na chu phor gang tsam yang 'bul lo// gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems skyed de/ bdag yun ring po'
dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing/ ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du song ste/ le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ blun pa/ log par lta ste/ mchod sbyin
yang mad/ sbyin sreg kyang med/ legs byas dang nyes byas kyi las rnams byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par snyani pa bsags pa'i ng med par ltadang/ 'dod pa'i lagyis non te/ bdag
gis mngag pa'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i lasakyis rnam par smin pa des 'dalta ste/ yid gs kyi yul du sbyin gnas thams cad gso ba ma yin pa/ 'gas su
rung ba'i lus thob ste/ 'dalta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas/ de nas bdag yi dgas su gyur taM/ lo mang po/ lo stong phrag mang pa/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por mo
mo mur za zhing 'i sgra'ang ma thosan lus kyis lta ga la zhig reg ste/ bdag gis nad ltar mnyes par byas pas/ bdag dge ba'i lus thob kyis//
sbyin gnas thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya zhing lus dang srog la malta bar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/slob dpon la ras go bya'o
snyam du sems bskyed pa gsum pa 'dabaskyad nas/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyenabakur byed de/ than chu [E] gang tsam yang 'bul lo// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// dza ltar grags pa bsten pa dang// ji ltar nye bar bsten pa ltar// dadag/yang dang yang bsten pas// de yang de dang 'dra
bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbangasong nas// dge ba'i bshesaganyen rnam par spangs// le lo mo zhing brtson 'grus nyams// g.ye dang phrag dog ser sna can// byas pa yod
par gang lta ba// thams cad du ninam sbyangs nas// bdag ni yi dgas skye gnas su// 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob bo// yun ring dus su 'khor ba yi// mun gnag phud po
'jigs pa na// bkres pa dang naskom pas gzer// sdug bsngal mang po rjes su myong// sbyin gnas rnams ni ma mthong zhing// bdagags 'da'adra dal ba thob/ dal ni mang po/
stong rnams su// chu yis ya nga yong ma thes// da ltar bdag gis 'jig rten na// shin dudakon pa lta ba rnyed de// bdag gis slob dpon mnyes byas pas// dul ba 'byor pa
bdag gis thob// sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pas// bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen med// byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir// lus dang srog la ma blta'o// sangs
rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir// slob dpon bla ma mchod gnas la// rnam par dang ba'i sems kyis su// bstasteng gus par rab tu bya// shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa gsum pa 'di
bskyed nas// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde sbed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol pas slob dpen la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ than chu phor gang tsam yang
'bul la/ gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'adi ltar samA skyed de/bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin/
pas/ la 'tshonan/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms lasacan/ blun pas sems can la khu tshun dang thar mas brdegs shing gartse sa nas bsdus shing chade 'don te/ de'i
gzhalas sdig pa 'ang med/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa 'byung pa'i ng med do zhes de ltar lta ba dang/ de ltar bzod pa dang/ de ltar mosashing zhe sdang gi zil gyis non pas ma dag/
bya@#// ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des 'di lta ste/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho
bam yan pa 'jigs su rung ba'ilus thebs/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mgu bar ma byas pas/ des na bdagarngamo dang/ ba glang dang/ bong bur gyur te/ rtswa brazhing dbyug pas
bsngags pas 'jigs pas bsngags nas mi 'dod bzhin du khal bkal te// bdag gsand ltar mnyes par bya ste dge ba'i lus thob kyis/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i slobadapon
la rim gro dang bsnyen bak+tar bya'o zhes/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bzhi pa de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la ris rtse dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang
tsam yang 'bul la/ 'di la da'achos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la'adi skad ces bya'o// yuna'ang par na'aphags pa'i lam// mdzag par gnas pas na/
rdzam dag dang deng bur gyur// sdug bsngal mang po rjes su myong// ma gyur pa yang bdag gis rnyed// gang gis byang chub reg 'gyur ba'i/ bzang po yin las byas te// de namakhas pa'i
mtshan nyid do// sangs rgyas chos la rab gnas shing// dad pa dang ni ldan par bya// byang chub phyir na slob dpon la// rim gro dang na bsti stang bya// 'das pas dus kyi bskul
pa bsam med nas// 'khor ba'i 'khor lor yongs su 'khyam pa na// skye mched dag ni don med 'das gyur te// sbyin gnas dag na da bar 'tshob man// dge ba'i bshes gtan/
yongs su spungs gyur nas// rtag tu sdig pa'i grogs por ba bsten te// de dag gsan bstan pa'i rjes 'jug cing// rgyun ma 'chad par ngan song sa la gnas// brtsona' dang na
bcing zhung brdeg pa rnams// byed du bcugatsang gzhan la skyes byas nas// de ya 'bras bu ngan song skye gnas 'tshe// sdig pa'i las kyis sdug bsngal rjes su myong// dge
ba'i bshes gnyan rnams ni ma bstan pas// rnga ma ba glangad bzhin bod bu yi// dan pa'i mtshams kyi skye mchod bzung gyur nas dbyug pa dag gisabardeg cing khal kyang
bkal// mir 'gyur ba ni shin tu rnyed dka' dang// mthun pa'i yul dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed// shin tu yun ring dalab med gyur te// dka' ba'i las kyis bu gar chud pa bzhin
lus dang ngag ni shin tu bsdams gyur nas// zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsams// dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la g.yo med pas// bdag gis lus ni zhi bar 'tsho
bar bya// bdag gi slob dpon bla ma gang dag dang// gang dag bdag gi byang chub sems bskyed pa// byang chub dam pa mchog gi lam ston la// ston pa bzhin du dga'o
bas bsnyen bkur bya// rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi byug pa dang// dridang phyi ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang// gos dang mu tig dag gi chun po yis// rkang gnyis
dam pa la ni mchod par bya// phyogs bcu dag nas nigs rgyas gang bzhugs pa// sems can don la brtson zhing don dam gzigs// gser gyi kha dog lta ba'od mdzad pa// kha
dog mtha' yas pa la mchod pa ra bya// sangs rgyas ma ya kha la sbyar rnams la// 'dzag rten spyod dang mchod pa chen byas pas// gang gis byang chub snying po bdag 'gro ba'i/
byang chub lam ni shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur// ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bzhi pa 'di bskyod nas// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde spyod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs
su tshol bsaslob dpon la 'omigrodad pasnyen bkur byed de/ thAn chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul 'a// gzhan yang shAri bu byang chub sems dpa' 'ad ltar sems skyed
bdag yun ring par dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing/ sdog pa'i grogs pos zin pas le lo can/ brtson 'grusanyams pa/ snyoms sa can/ thun pas 'di
lta bu'i lta ba dang/ 'di lta bu'i 'dod pas sems can thams cad dang/ srog chags thams cad kyangesha gcig tu sbyangs shing/ sha gtsag tu bcar taM/ bsod nams ma
yin pa'i las byed kyang de'agazhi las sngag pa med/ do'i gzhi las sngog pa'i rnam pa med do// rgya mtsho'i tshu rol gyi sems can ji snyed dedag thams cad sbyin pas tshim par byas/
kyang de'i gzhi las bsod rnams med/ de'i gzhi las bsod nams kyi rnam pa med do/ rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi sems can rdzasnyadapa de dag thams cad bsad cing gtubs kyang de'i
gzhi las sdug pa mad/ de'i gzhi las sdug pa'i rnam pa med do snyam pas/ de ltar byas kyang bsod nams dang sdig pa yongasasu shes par ma nus te/ sdig pa'i lta ba bsnyen pa
dad/ gti mug gi zil gyis non pas/ bdag gis sdug pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste// sems
can dmyal bar dman pa 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob ste/ de la'adalta bu'i spyan gnas mnyes par ma byas pas/ des na bdag ni sems can dmyal ba par gyur pas/
lcags kyi thu lum btsugs pa za zhing gcig tu sdug bsngal ba/ rtsub pa// mi brdzad pa/ 'tshog pa// 'chi ba'i mthar khrid pa myong zhing la stong phrag mang po'i bar du bde
ba'i sgra'ang ma thos na/ lus kyis lta ga la zhig rogaste/ bdag gis ni da lta'i mnyes par byas pas dge ba'i lus thob kyis/ skyon sa/nas rnams kyis nye bar 'tsho bar
bya zhing/ lus dang sreg la ma lta bar slob dpon la ma ge dad bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes/ shA ri'i bu soms bskyed pa lnga pa de bskyed nas/ byang nub
sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la mi rtse dang bsnyen bkur byed do/ than chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pa'i tshatshags su bcad pa'i di dag gsungs so// sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa dang/ sdog pa'i sems kyis bsus pas na/ sdug par
lta la brten gyur te/ bdag gis stag pa'i las byas so// rgya mtsho ya ni tshu rol na// sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa// zas dang skoms gyis tshim byas kyang// bsad nams
dug gi 'byung gnas med// rgya mtsho yin pha rol na// sems can gnas pa dza snyed pa// thams cad bsad cing bcom gyur kyang// sdig pa'i 'byung gnas med do zhes//
sdig pa'i lto ba 'di lta bu// yang dang yang du bsten pas na// gcached du ma bawad ma rungs pa'i// sems can dmyal bar ring dudangs// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten
gyi yongs su'adren pa ma mthong bas// bdag gi lus ni stong rnams kyang// ngan 'gro dag ni gsum du dengs// 'di na 'jig rten dag pa ste// de yi sgra na thos gyur nas//
bang gas mi yi dngos thob kyis// bzang po yi ni las bya'o// ma'i 'gyur ba ni dka' ba ste// ma srog thob pa 'ang dka' ba yin// dam pa'i chos thos dka' ba ste// sangs/
rgyas 'byung ba'ang dka' ba yin// bdag gas mir skye dka' ba yi// tshe thob pa ni g.yo zhing 'gyur// bdag gis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang// rgyal bas kun mkhyen bstan pa/
rnyed// lus kyi las dang ngag gi las// yod kyi las kyang sdug pa can// ma 'dod ma bzad 'bras bur 'gyur// phyin chad sladaM pa ra ma bya'o// bsam pa rnam par dag
pa ya lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// 'jig rten rab tu dka' spyod ma// bzad pa dag gyi las bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir// bdag ni bla mar ga
grags pa'i// bka' las 'da' bar mi bya'o// bsnyen bkur dag ni rab tu bya// lam ni drang po zhes bya ba// g.yo med pas na rab bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub
phyi'i[ï¼š]skya mar 'gyur bar ma bya'o// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' ma 'dzags pa// de lta bur na samasabaskyed nas// snod gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul//
shA ra'i bu sems bskyed pa lta ba 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snyed na chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen
'a@#// bkur byed de/ than chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ pa zhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems skyed de/ bdag yun
ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing/ sdug pa'i grogs pos zin pas 'dud pa dang// rab tu dud pa dang/ gus par sla ba dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ ltung ba dang/
thal mo sbyar ba las kyi rnam par san pa med de zhes de ltar mes pa'i bar gyis nga rgyal gyi zil gyis nan bas/ sngag pa mdage ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ ma dag
ba' las pa'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang du sbyane gnas thams cad lta bar 'tsho ba ma yin par smad pa'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mas par ma byas pas//
dar bdag marigyur pa na/ ma bkren pa dang/ ma dbul pa dang/ bran du gyur pa dang/ gzhan gyi dbang du song ba dang/ 'dod palazhin pa'i sems can rnams dang/ 'dod pa la/
chags pa rnams dang/ ma rigs pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa rnams dang/ log par lta ba rnams dang/ tshul khrims log par zhugs pa rnams dang// lta ba log par zhugs pa/
rnams dang// mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang/ 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa'i 'agro pa bzhi la 'gro bar zhugs pa rnams dang sgrib pa ltas kha bas pa rnams dang/ bla ma/
drug la gus par ma gnas pa rnams dang/ dAm pa'i chos ma yin pa bdun la 'jug pa dang/ lag pa brgyad la log par nges pa rnams dang 1 gnod pa dgu'i dngos pos gnod par/
gyur pa rnams dang/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'a lam don par zhugs pa rnams dang/ saMms can dmyal ba'i lam la mngon par phyogs pa rnams dang/ mthe bas kyi lam
la u phyogs pa rnams dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba rnams dang/ sdig pa'i grogs pa 'i lag tu song ba rnams dang/ bdud kyi dbang du song ba rnams dang/ dge
ba'i chos yongs su spangs pa rnams dang/ ma dge ba'i chos la spyod pa rnams dbyugs pas bsngags 'jags pas bsdigs nas/ mi 'dod bzhin du byed cing rim gro dang bsnyan
bkur byed par gyur te/ bdag gis ni da ltar dredug mas par byas bas dgu ba'i lus thob kyis/ sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya'o// lus dang srog lamalta bar slob
dang nal rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes shA'a'i bu sems bskyed pa drug de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dang ba slob dpon la ma gro dang bkon bkur byed de/ tha na rlu bum pa gang
tsam yad 'bul 'bo// des bcom ldan 'angs kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab du rtag tu gzhug pa'i rab/ ri'i tshags su bcad pa 'di dal du gsungs sa// sdig pa'i
grogasani nga rgyal rgyags 'phel ba// bskal pa mang po rgya mtshor bstan pas na// ma yin nang du skyes kyang bran du gyur// 'khor ba'i rgyun du yun ring dus su 'khor/
lus rab tu rud bar dka' yang// de nibadagags dka' bar thobagyurata/ gnas nga 'i yu lan mthun pa bzang po dang// sangs rgyas 'khyud dang rala'abyor de bzhin no// grogs
po gang dag mchog tu ba bzang ba// byang chub sems dang 'ispyod dang 'am ston cing// byang chub sum san rin chen 'phar byed pa// de dag bskal pa bye ba mang pos rnyed// lus ni
nyam chung ma rtag mi brtan te// dbu ba rdos dang chu yi chu bur 'dra// sgyu ma lta bur gang la ltadang mtshungs// malas mthong dang 'drid par skya babazhin// srog na yu na thung tsho yang
zad par 'gyur// ji ltar sprin dang theg ni mo gnas ltar// skad cig tu ni de bzhin srog kyang 'gyur// snying po med las snying palen par byed// gang gis 'das pa'i dus
kyi bskal pa yang// rgya mtsho bsgyu phrag bsam yas bslus gyur pa// nga rgyal ra bi ma 'dar gzhom pa yi// dus dang tshod dang man na sa gnas kyis// lus la sprug pa
thams cad rab spangs nas// srog la chags pa med pa'i yod kyis ni// nga dang rgyags dang dregs pa spangs gyur nas// yon tan ldan la rim gro gus bcas bya/ dong dang ]
[']/ rgyugs pa dregs pa sangs gyur nas// pha dang ma dad bu pa rnams dang// 'jig rten bla ma mchog tugang grags la// gus dang bcas shing mchog gi ma gro bya// byang
chub sems dpa' byang chub ma zhugs nga// gang dag bdag dang byang chub mthun spyod la// dga' dang gus pa brtan pa bskyed byas te// rim gro baba'i phyir brtsen par bya// skye dgu
nga rgyal ldan pa nga rgyal sbangs// ma mkhas nga rgyal bcad cing gdul ba'i phyir// yo shes rdo rje dag gse bcom byas nas// rgyags dang nga rgyal ba ni phasA'i bar bya// byang chub spyod pa yongs
su rdzogs byas te// byang chub snying po mchog la gnas gyur nas// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rtsod pa rnams btul te// chu bo bzhi las srog chags bsal bar bya// phyogs bcu dag na
mi gangan pa rnams/ rang gi mi gtsang bar lhung smad pa lo// byams pa dang na snying rje'i yid kyis su// mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur bar bya// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i
dus la bab// sangs rgyas yon tan bslab pa bsgrub nus shes// bzod pa bsgom par bya bsun sum tshogs// mdud pa med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya// bsam gtan
pa rol phyin thob phun sum tshogs// sems tsan 'dul ba'i dus ni bar gnas// thabs dang shes rab mkhas la gnas gyur te// bla ma thams cad la ni bskor bar bya//
de ltar bsod nams stobs dang gzi brjid spel/ shes rab ye shes mkhas pas bsam cha khyab// rang darang dam pa dag gis mngon 'phags te//
myur bun yongs su gang ba'i snod phyin no// shar 'i bu byang chub sems dpa3sems bskyed pa drug pa 'dabaskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dang 'a sde snod
yongs su tshal pas slob dpon la ra se dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ phran chu bum ba gang tsam yang 'bul lo// gzhan nga shA ri'i bu byang chub sams dpa' 'daltar
sems skyid de/ bdag yun ring par dag ba' bshes gnyen dang bral zhing/ sdug pa'i theg pa dang ja da pas/ la la can/ lo dkyus nyams pa/ ston las can/ thunar
zlags ra ra gyur te/ las nag pa dang nag po'i rnam pa la snyan pa 'ang med/ las dkarapo dang dkar po'i rnam par smin pa'i ng med/ la[/ ]3 dung dkar gdan g rnam pa las+san pa'i ng
med mi gnagacung dkar ba'i las dang ma nag mang dkar ba'i rnam par snyani pa'i ng med do zhes de ltar lta/ de ltar bzed/ de ltar mos pas dge spyong zam/ bram ze la btsun pa dag/
ngag pa gang/ mdage ba gang/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang/ kha nam tho ba med pa gang/ bsnyen par bya ba gang/ nga sten par ma bya ba gang (phya ba'i/ sa pa gang/ bya ba'i ma'il/
