bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i don rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir/ dalits+tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsus so// bsam gtan dang na rnam thar pha rol phyin// pad+ma chu yis gos pa med pa/
ltar padazhi chags yod dag pa 'jig rtenan// bskal mang rgya mtshor rtag tu sdudab spyod// gang du ting 'dzin rol song ba yi// rnam par snang mdzad zhi ba ting 'dzin dang// zla 'od ces
bya ting 'dzin rnam bkod ba// de nyid glog gis rab tu brgyan pa dang// mngon pa 'phags dang de bzhin sems dpa' dang// dri ma med dang snang ldan ting ratshan dang// yon tan 'od dang grub 'od mya ngan
mad chos rnams thams cad la ni dbang sgyur dang// chos sgron dang ni de bzhin chos dpar dang// ting 'dzin chos kyi dbang phyug la rab dbar// dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes dbang byed dang//
dam chos kun 'dzin shin tu rnam dag dang// gzhan gyi sams la rnam dpyod ting 'dzin dang// dam chos kun mchog 'od zer ting 'dzin dang// rgyal mtshan rtse mo dpung rgyan nyon mongs sal/
bdud kyi stobs rnams 'dzoms pa'i ting 'dzin dang// stobs bcu dang ni stobs las mngon 'phags dang// kun bcad chags med ces bya ting 'dzin dang// lag na sgron ma bdud sprin bsgrugA
ba dang// sa 'dzin legs par gnas pa'i ting 'dzin dang// ri rab sgron dang rgyal ba ma 'a tham dang// ye shes sgron dang de bzhin mig gtsang dang// rgyal ba thams cad dam pa'i ting 'dzin dang/
chos dran dang na yon tan ye shes 'jug/ stong par 'jug dang de bzhin mtshan ma dang// smon med ting 'dzin de bzhin zhi ba'i sa// 'du shes sna tshogs bral zhes bya ba dang// rab
dul klu dbang stag ces bya ba dang// 'khyil ba dang ni rnam par ldeg pa dang// 'dzams pa med dang stobs dang mig dag dang// ting 'dzin rdo rje 'dra dang rdo rjes// mngon
'phags ma 'dzum lhun po lta bu dang// kun nas glong 'khyil rnam par dag sgra dang// nges rtogs nyon mongs bral ba'i ting 'dzin dang// nam mkha' 'dra dang nam mkha'i
bar skabs dang/ yon tan thams cad gus par len pa dang// blo gros dran rtogs blo 'phel stobs mi zad// nges tshig bstan pa mtha' yas ma zad dang// legs byas
byas pa chud mi za ba dang// lta ba dang ni 'gro ba tshim byed dang// byams pa mngon 'phags snying rje yangs pa'i rtsa// dgar dang mchog tu dgar la 'dug pa dang// btang snyoms
dang na gnyis la chags grol dang// chos don chos kyi 'od zer ting 'dzin dang/ 'a khrug med ye shes sgron dang ye shes mtsho// rnam grol snying po 'gro ba tshim byed dang// rdo rje rgyal
[% ]@#// mtshan pad+ma dam ba dang// chos kyis rgyal dang mi g.yo tang 'dzin dang// shes rab rtsibs dang zhi ba sas rgyus mtsho// 'od zer mtha' yas rnam grol sbyin pa dang/ de
[ã€‘ ]la shes ting 'dzin de bzhin gshegs kyi rgyan// bkod pa chen po zhing bkod snang ba dang// sems can bsam pa yongs rang dga' pa dang// rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam la rtag mthun dang/
pha rol phyin pa rgyun dang bkod mchog gtsug/ ting 'dzin byang chub yan lagam tog sbyin// rnam grol snying po bdud rtsi sbyin ba dang// rlung dang rlung bzhin 'gro ba mi dmigs dang//
mtsho shugs 'dzan rin chen mdzod ldan dang// khrag dang ra 'khrab rgyal po zhes bya dang// rdzu 'phrul yangs dang shin tu don 'dzin dang// sangs rgyas yul ston ting nge 'dzin dag dang// de dang
gzhan yang rgya chen mtha' yas pa'i// zhiba'i ting 'dzin bye ba khong du chud/ dgong dag bsam gtan pha rol phyin spyod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dpag med de/ mnyam par
bzhag nas bsam gtan spyod yul 'phreng// mnyam par bzhag nas rgod pa med par rachag/ mnyam par bzhag nas 'dug cing nyal bar byed// de yi spyod lam mnyam par ma bzhag mad[1]
mnyam por bzhugs khas sgra na 'byin byed de// chos 'di thams cad zhwa dang rab zhi ba// rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med// bdag med srog med dbang phyogs dag kyang med/ byang chub
sems dpa' mkhas pa snying rdzacan// bsam gtan pa rol phyin pa sbyong byed pa/ yon tan rgyu pa de yi yon tan ni// 'di dang gzhan yang pa la mtha' yas pa'o// bsam gtan gyi
rol tu phyin pa ri wedu sta bcu ba'o/// shA ri bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la brtsonan/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa sbyong par 'gyu3
ba'i byang chub sems dparasems dpa' chen por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ de la shA ri'i bu byang chub sems da pa la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'bcu
nyam par byed da 'dzin par byed da 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ gnyen la'ang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par byang de shA ri'i bu de la byang chub

rnam pa gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dun pa'i rnam pa dang/ bsam pa'i rnam pa dang/ sbyor ba rnam pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rnam pa dang/ nga rgyal med pa'i rnam pa dang/ rab tu
'dud pa'i rnam pa dang/ rimor byed pa'i rnam pa dang/ mthunapa'i rnam ba dang/ bka' blo bde ba'i rnam pa dang/ bsnyan bkur byed ba'i rnam pa dang/ rna ba blags te
te nyan ba 'i rnam ba dang [0f10 ]bkur sti byed pa'i rnam pa dang/ yid la bya ba'i rnam ba dang/ mi g.yeng ba'i rnam ba dang/ rin po cher 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang/ sman du 'du shes pa'i rnam
ba dang/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i 'du shes kyi rnam pa dang/ dran pa'i stod kyi rnam pa dang/ rtogs pa shes ba'i rnam pa dang/ blo gros 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang/ blo la 'jug/
pa'i rnam pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos spos pas ma ngoms pa rim ba dang/ gtong bsal ba'i rnam pa dang/ byin nas mi smod pa'i rnam ba dang/ mang du thos bstan pa rnam pa dang/
gus par dka' ba myong bar byed pi rnam pa dang/ lus sim pa'i rnam pa dang/ sems rangs ba'i rnam pa dang sa skyo bar nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ don nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ chos nyan
ba'i rnam pa dang/ nan tan nyan pa'i rnam ba dang/ thog pa gzhan la 'dod pa med bar nyan pa rnam pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyan
ba'i rnam pa dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ thabs mkhas ba nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang/ mngon par shes pa nyan pa'i rnam ba/

pa 'byas/ gzhan la'ang bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na nan tan snying por byed pa yin no// chos rnams la nan tan byed pa gang na/ ga nga ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du gnas pa ste
de ni chos la nan tan byed do// gzhan yang chos la nan tan byed pa de ni gang chos thams cad ma len pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams len na'ang log pa khInan tan du 'gyur te/ gang khrag
gung chos len par gnas pa ni chos de dag las 'byang bar 'byung pa'i gnas dang skabs med de/ de ni gnas med pa'o// gang phyug mi len par sprod pa rnams kyang gsal/
ba'i phyir/ chos 'di dgal nan tan du bzhag pa the tsom du 'gyur na/ chos len par spyod pa rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de bas na chos thams cad mi len pa ni nan tan no// gzhan yang gang
chos rnams la mi sgrub pa de ni nan tan zhes bya'o// gang chos rnams la rlom sems med pa dang/ gang chos rnams mi len pa dang/ sa rol pa dang/ mi su ba ngang tsha ga pa de ni nam ra nyen
byar gzhan yang chos rnams la bsnan pa med pa dang/ pasal ba med pa de ni nan tan zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gong du cung zad kyang ma la shad/ ji ltar ba[q] pa 'an du mi snang ba de lta bu ni ches
thams cad mi snang ba/ mi blang ba/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// mtshan nyid gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'o// mtshan nyid pa da pa red pa// nge zhigs kalas la gdu
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun brtags pa 'am/ yang dag par brtag pa de nyid mtshan nyid med par bshad pa yin no// 'di ni mtshan nyid de/ 'di ni mtshan nyid ma yin par zhis/ 'di lta ste/ tshes
thams cad la mtshan nyid med pa/ maM snang ba/ blang ba med par rtogs pa de ni nan tan zhes bya'o// nan tan la brtson par gyis shig/ chos thams cad mi sgrib pa snang ba spong ra byes se
de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la// shin tu nges par nan tan gnas byed pa// mkhas
pa de na chos bar dzin ma byed// mi 'dzin pa san nan tan de 'dra'o// mis ni chos nyid stong par mi byed de// chos la'ang de ni stong par rlom sams mad// stong pa'i chos la rlom sems gang yang
mad rlom sems med phyir nan tan de 'dra 'o// chos la lenapa med cing 'dod pa med// chos ni chos la len par byed pa med// len pa med phyir 'di na chos kyi mtshan// 'di 'dra ba ni nan tan
zhes bya'o// gang phyir chos la nams kyang de mi chags// de la de yi ye shes blangs ma gyur// ye shes ma myangs de la'ang rlom sems med// de 'dra ba lanan tan zhes bya'o// mkhas pa/
sbyas pa'i yon tana gnas par gyis// chos 'di dag la shin tu brtson bgyis// cho ga spyod pa dag la gnas gyur na// de tshe de la sgo ni dag par 'gyur// sgo dag nas ni chos 'di 'dra ba
shes den sams la bsam pa'i ng shes par 'gyur// mkhas pas de tsho bsam pa shes nas ni// 'di 'dra ba yi chos kyang 'chad bar 'gyur// zab mo'i chos la don dam mkhas ra
nas rtag tu don la rnam par gdon mi za// spyod pa mtha' yas yon tan rnams kyis 'phags// mkhas pa mang du thos pa rgya mtsho 'dra// de yi don dang tshig 'bru dag la yang//

snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu nyan pa nas/ gzhan la rgya cher bstan pa'i bar du byas nas ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag mun pa rab 'apa stag po gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cud la stang pa glob

rma phyir nga ltar thos pa 'i chos rnams rtogs pas na/ dra geg pa phrub pa zhi ba zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ ji lta
man bas khyab bsgribs pas// khyim du zhugs par gyur na ni// yod par gyur pa'i gzugs rnams kyang// mig gis mthong bar mi 'gyura'o// de bzhin du ni 'di la yang// la la' mi dag
skyes gyur kyang// dge ba dang ni sdig pa'i chos// ma thos par ni shes mi nus// thos nas chos rnams rnam par shes// thos nas sdig pa bstan mi bya// thos nas gnod pa sbyong bar/
byed 3thos nas mya ngan 'das par thob// thos par 'dod pas thos phal// thos pas shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// shes rab kyis ni don rnams sbyong// don 'thob nas ni bde 'thob
'gyur// don thob de ni yid rna ste// tshe 'ad la na mya ngan 'a das// chos la sbyor zhing gtsang la mkhas// shan tu bde ba thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dang 'a sde snong na// thos
nas chos nyid gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten la na snang gyur nas// byang chub kyi ni spyad pa spyod// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rdzol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'dzin pa'i gang zag la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes

pas/ chos thams cad lasgrub pa med pa 'thob bo// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// chos smra ba ni gang yin pa// de la dag pa'i

rtag par shes rab rnam par slong// ye shes la ni rtag tu gnas// de ni bdag nyid chos shes// dang nga 'i phyir ni 'gro ma byed// sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bshad pa// mi g.yo ba yi chos shas so//
mkhas pa de dgatshig rnams 'byed la mkhas// bslabs pa don la khong du chud pa'i byed// de dag dkar po'i phyo gas nirtag par sbyong/ 2nag po'i phyogs ni rtag tu sbyong bar byed// de yi sems
la rnams kyang nyams pa med// de ni chos rnams gang la'ang zhum pa med// lus kyang de bzhin sems dang brtson 'grus dang// 'dun pa yang ba'ang myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ chos thos nas ni
shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// ye shes rnam par rtogs nas dran m nyams// dran dang ye shes la ni rtag gnas nas// dge dang mi dge'i chos ni rab tu shes// bla na med pa'i chos rnams slathA
nas ni// rtogs dang dran pa shes rab stobs mchog thob// ji ltar bdag nyid yun ring bslabs pa bzhin// des ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes 1/chos bslabs nas ni khyad
par 'thob 'gyur te// khyad par thob cing ye shes dag gyur nas// de ni sems can rnams kyi bsam pa shes// de phyir bsam pa bzhin du chos ston to// shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub
07/ sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod do////bam po bcu bdun pa// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa de ltar blo sbyangs pa dang/ de ltar chos snang ba'i sgoh+phun cu yongs su dag pas 'di ltar slob ste/ 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba 'byung ba ni rgyu gnyis dang/
rkyen gnyis te/gnyis gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi sku dang 2 bdag nyar tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o// de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhan gyi sgra de gang/ bag nyung tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de gang zhe
na de de ltar tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na/ 'di snyam dusems par 'gyur te/ rnal 'byor spyod pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'daa thos/ 'phags pa'i chos/
'dul ba ma thos par/ting nge 'dzin tsam gyis dga' ba reng nas/ nga rgyal gyi dbang gis che ba'i nga rgyal du lcab de gni skye ba dang/rgya ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang//
smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug ba las yongs su mi thar/ tsug bsngal gyi phung po las yongs sum thar to/ de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas dgos
nas 'di skad gsungs so// pha rol la rjes su mthun pa thos pani ba dang 'be las rnam par grol ba'o/ de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ chos rnams thos nas rnam par shes// thos nas/
@#/// sdig pa mi byed de// thos nas gnod pa spong bar 'gyur// thos nas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob// thos 'dod thos pa 'phel bar 'gyur// thos pas shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur//
shes rab kyis don rnams sbyong// na rad nas ni bde thob 'gyur// don rud de ma yong rno ste// tshe 'di la niyu ngan 'das// chos gtsang mkhas pa gtsang ba dang/ mchog tu bde ba thob par 'gyur
dkashar 'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba shin tu ma nyan par bya/ rlung bar bya/ gzung bar bya//

bkag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tubastan par bya'o// shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad ma nyan pa dang/ tshul bzhin du
sbyor ba ma byed ba de dag ni 'phagasapa' lam las yo su nyams pa ra 'gyur te/ de la dgongs nas nge ba 'du gshegs pa 'di skad du/ rangag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni rga ba dang 'tshib las grol
ba'o zhes/gsung ngo// de 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba ni gang ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba yin sAmams/ de 'di ltar slob ste/ byang chub
semasudang 'a mas dpa' chen po na chos gang la'ang sbyor bar mi byed/ rab tu sbyor bar mi byed do// tshul bzhin du tshor ba zhes bya ba danam sbyor ba'i tshig bla dgas so// gzhan yang byang chub
sems par tshul bzhin du slob ban sgra 'byin par mi byed/ zlos pa 'byin par ma byed/ gangs sgra byung bda'ang ma de[@]gas// sgra de da gang nas byung gang du 'gagasangashes sngon gyi mtha' dang/
phyi ma'i mthul la rtog par spyad de/ gang smras pa dang/ gang smra ba dang/ gang skyabar 'gyur ba dang/ gong gis smras pa dang/ gangag bdang/ gangego sla bar 'gyur ba dang gang spong pa'i phyir

smras pa dang/ gang song ba'i ri skya ba dang/ gang spong ba'i phyir skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smras pa dang/ gang khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smra ba dang/ gang khong du chu
par bya ba'i phyir smra bar 'gyur ba de them cad yongs su btsalan 'dus nga 'i rnam pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnam pa dang da ltar byung ba'i rnam par ma dmigs pa de ni/ de'i tshul bzhin
sbyor ba'o zhes de de ltar slob bo/ byang chub sems dang 'ad lta tshul bzhin du sbyor bas ji ltar na tshul bzhin du mthong zhin/ da 'di ltar slog ste/gang ga tshon byang chub sems dpa'
tshes thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'gags par mthong ba de 'tsho tshul bzhin mthong ngo// gang ga mo chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar mgrong brda'i[%]tshul bzhin mabrongango// gar
gi tshe chos thams cad rnam par zhabar mthong ba de 'a tsho tshul bzhin mthong ngo// gang gi tsho chos thams cad ngo bzhin gyis soms par ma zhugs pa mthong ba de'i tshe tshul bzhin mthong ngo/
gurag chos thams cad ma skyes par mthong ba de'atsho tshul bzhin mthong ngo// gang gi tshe chos thams cad ma byung bar mthong ba de'i tshul bzhin mthong ngo// gang
gang gi tshe chos thams cad shin tu yang dgapa ma byang bar mthong ba de'i tshul bzhina mthong ngo// gang gatsho chos h+phams cad mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba de'i tshul bzhin mthong ngo//
de gang gis mthong bde ba'ang rtog ste/ ci nas kyang mi mthong ba dang ma rtog pa de ltar mthong ste/ de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o// yang 'di ltar slob sto/ byang chub sems
dang ra tshul bzhin du sbyor ba na/ chos gang la'ang the tsom dang rmongs pa med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor banis gang la'ang sgrib pa medado// tshul bzhin du spo ban tshos gang la'ang gang thapha'i

sgor mi 'gyur ba med do// tshul bzhin ngu sbyor ba na chos gang yang spang bar byapa'i phur 'bad pa medado// gang tshul bzhin du sbyarab ni chos gang la'ang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bud pa mad do// gang
chos thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang/ ji lta ba bzhin ngu mthong ba da ni yang dag par lta ba'o// chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong pa gang yin/ 'di lta sta/ ma mthong ba'o/ ma mthong ba

! zhes bya ba de ni maskyes pa'i tshig bla dgas so/ ma skyes pa zhes bya bde ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i tshig bla ngags so/[â€ ]/yang dag par ma byung ba zhes bya ba gang zhan/de nam snang ba'i tshig bla gas ta
de bzhin gshegs pas de la dgongs nas 'du byed thams cad mi skya bar mthong na yang dgapa nyid du nges pa la 'jug ste/ 'de lta ste/ yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa de ni yang dag par
ba'o zhes de skang gsung do// de 'dasnyam du sems te/ de ci'i phyi'i zhan/ yang dagapa 'di du nges pa la 'jug pa zhes bya zhes de 'ad ltar slob ste/ chos thams cang gang dang mnyam pa sangs rgyas
kyi chos de dang mnyam// de bas na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug pa'o// de lta bas na yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'dod pa rnayus kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di di ngashani mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ bklog par bya/ kun chub par bya'o/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi tshes kyi rnamagrangs 'di nyid la'ang tshul bzhin du
sbyor bar bya ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shAri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'6shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

po la spyod pa de ltar blo shin tu yongs su sbyangs ba dang/ de ltar chos snang ba'i sgo ne shuyongs su dag pas tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson na/ tshul bzhin gyi tsheg mthong ngo// de la tshul bzhin du
'jug pa gang tshul bzhin gyi tshig gang zhin/ de ltar byang tshub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin du 'jug pa ni/ 'di ltaste/ zhi gnas kyi gnas la 'jug pa dang/ lhag mthong rnam par rtog pa la 'jug pa'i
[s/ ]@#// tshul bzhin du 'jug pa'o// lus dben par 'jug pa dang/ sems yid du 'ong bar 'jug ba dang/ chad pam yin par 'jug pa dang/ rtag pam yakhar 'jug ba dang
rgyu dar rgyan la 'jug pa dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang/ sems can yod pa dang/ srog med pa dang/ gangabag med pa la 'jug pa dang/ ma'ongs mkhyen mi gnas pa la 'jug ba dang/

mi 'pho ba dang/ rgyudang 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang/ rgyu stong pa nyid du rnam par 'byed pa la 'jug pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa 'dris par bya ba la 'jug pa dang/ smod pa chad pa rab tugs pa la 'jug kyang stong
pa nyid dang/ smon pa med pa len par 'jug pa ma yin pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa len pa la 'jug kyang/ ting nge 'dzaregyi dbang gis slob lam 'jug ba dang//
mngon par shes pa'i ye shes 'dren pa la 'jug kyang/ zag pa zad pa 'am 'jug pa dang/ mi skye bar rtog pa la 'jugakyang nges par gyur bar 'gro ba la mi 'jug pa dang/ sams
thams cad bdag med par rtog par 'jug kyang/ sAng nan po gtongs lam 'jug pa dang/ skye ba thams cad 'jig par mthong ba la 'jug pa dang/ srid pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa len pa la

'jug pa dang/ mya ngan las 'da' ba 'dod pa la 'jug kyang dachos mngon du byab la mi 'jug pa dang/ 'dod pa 'i yon tan gyi dgab btang snyoms pa la 'jug kyang/ chos kyi dga' ba dor ba la ma 'jug pa dang/

[d, ]rtog pas spros pa thams cad gtong ba la 'jug kyang/ thabs mkhas pa gtong ba la ma 'jug bsti shu'i bu ni tshu pa bzhin du 'jug pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bu de la tshul bzhin gyi tshig ces pa ba gapanyen/

gas pa'i tshag de ni tshul bzhin gyi rgug go/ shA ri'i bu gzhan yatshul bzhin rgyu tshog den tshul gyi tshagago/ den sgri'atshog go na la'i tshigago/ de ni rgyu'i tshig go/ den rib tu rnam par 'byed pa'i tshag 'o

dan ma 'gal ba'i tshig go/ den ma rtsod pa'i mig gi/ don btang sems kyig go/ ma len pa'i tshog dang/ ma 'dor ba'i tshig dang/ mi phyes pa'i tshig dang/ mibasnan pa'i tshig dang/ ma bri ba'i tshag dang

mi skye ba'i tshigadang/ rtsod pa ' gzhumed pa'i tshig dang/ ma ldog pa'i tshig dang/ gan pong pa'i tshig dang/ de kho na'i tshig dang/ de ba[Ã©]na kho na'i tshig dang/ ma log pa de khazhan nyid kyi tshig dang/

gzhan ma yazhi pa de bzhin 'ad kyi tshig dang/ de bzhin nyid kyi tshig dang/ ji lta ba bzhin bya chogadang/ dus gsum mnyam pa'i tshag dang/ yongs su chad pa'i tshig dang/ gzugs rnam pa ngashes pa'i gnas/
med pa 'tshoge dang/ tshorab dang/ 'dushes dang/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par8shes pa gnas med pa'i chog go/ den yig dang/ gzugs dang/ mgag rnam par shes pa'i bu mas gas med
pa'i tshag go/ de ni rna ba dang/ sgrudang/ rnaba' nem par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i gego/ don sna dang/ dringang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go/ de na lce dang/
@#// rodang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go/ de na lus dang/ reg dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gnas med pa'i tshig go/ de ni yid dang/
chos dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pal khamasa gnas med pa' tsheg go/ de ni don la rton pa'i tshig go/ don chos la rton pa'i tshig go/ de na ye shes la rton pa'i tshag go/ de na nges pa'i don
gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i tshig ste/ shA ra'i bu de ni tshul pin gyi tshig go/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du 'jug pa la brtson pa/tshul 'ganegyi ge mthong ba de gang gis mthong bde
nyang m mthong ste/ ji ltar mi mthong/ rnam par mi mthong bde ltar mthong ngo/ de ltar mthong na tshul bzhin mthong ba zhes bya'o// shApa'i 'u yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du skye ba na chos
gang la'ang rmos par mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dpal tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang la yang tha pa'i sgom 'gyur ba mdo/ tshul bzhin du sbyor ba chos gang yang stong ba'aphyinge 'bad
ba med do// tshul bzhin du sbyor ba ni chos gang yang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa bod du/ gang tshes thams cad yang dag par mthong ba dang/ ji ltab bzhin mthong ba de na yang dag par lta ba'o//
chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ mi mthong ba'o// ma mthong ba gang zhan/ nganam skyes ba'i tshig bla dgas so// ma skyes pa zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ de ni
snang ba'i bar gyi tshig bla dgas te/ rgyachar ja ltar sngar 'das pa de ltar de bzhin du bzlas par bya ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dang 'a shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/
shA re 'bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa2 shes rab kyi pha rol taphan pa la sred pa 'ad ltar slob ste/ chos thams cad na'angag bzhin du tshul bzhin te dzAltar bdag la bdag med/
pa de bzhin du chos thams cad bgamed par mthong ngo// ji ltar sems can bdag med pa 'ozhin du/ chos thams cad bdag med par mthong ste/ de ltar mthong na tshul bkaMn du mthong ngo// gang
tshulathazhen 'khor ba'i khams mthong ba de tshul bzhin mya ngan las 'das pa'i bams dang ldan par mthong ba ste/ na chul bzhin du srung ba zhes bya'o// de'i chos tham sa cad kyi rang bzhin
la nyonamos pa'i rang bzhin du bye brag da pa dang ldan par mthong ngo// rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma yin par yang mi snyams so// tshul bzhin sbyor bas tshul bzhin mthong ste/ tshul bzhin gyi sbyor

ba ji snyed pa sems can gyi gnas thams cad kyang ji snyed do 1 sems can gyi gnas kyang mi mthong/ chos kyi gnas kyang 'khrug par ma byed pa ngan byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin skyod ba shA ri'i bu de lta na/

rnam pa 'di dang d+hAthos pa 'di dang tshul bzhin du 'jug pa 'di dang/ tshul bzhin mthong ba 'di dang/ ji lta bzhin du mthong ba'i rgyu sa thun pa 'di dang 'di dgan shes rab cesabasto/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang
chub sems dpal shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod do// shar 'abu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dus
byas la sprod pa'i chos thams cad la shes rab kyis mib/nas pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ 'du byed rnams dang lhan cig tuyi gnas ba nas rgyas par byas te/ rga shi'i
bar dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ bdag tu lta dang lhan cig tum gnasapa nas// bdag tu lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang lhan cig mi gnas/ mazlo bar sems pa
dang ldan cag tu mi gnas/ dma' bar sems pa dang lhan cig tu ma gnas/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad rnams dang lhan cig rnyami gnas // nga rgyal dang/ chab 'i nga rgyal dang/ log pa'i nga rgyal nas/
nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nyi shu'ashar dang lhan cig tumi gnas / chen po dang/ 'bring po dang/ phra[W]nas niyon mongs pa thas cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas ga mug gimun pa rab rib kyi lAde
thog sgrib pa dang chod par byed dang kun tu dakris te 'dug pa nas/ dma' pa'i chos thams cad kyi ba dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/rtson pa'i gopa ngang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ phung po dang lha'ibu
dang 'chi bdag gi bdud nas/ bang thams cad kyi las kyi ngang lhan cig tums nas/ bdag dang/ sems can dang/ srog dang/ gso bdang/ gang zag dang/ shed bu gang shad las sa pa
[4]/ nas bdag tul ba thams cad kyi bshang lhan cig tum gnas/ las kyi sgrib pa dang/ 'onamongs pa'i khe pa dang/ chos kyi sgrib pa dang/ lta ba'i sgrib pa dang/ rnam par smin pa'i slathe pa dang/
mingashos pa'i sgrib panas bag chags kya mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu m gnas kun tu rtog pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa dang/ mtshan ma ngang/ dmigs pa nga / meng ba
dang thos pa dang/ dran pa dang/ rnam par rig pa dang/ mdud pa'i sgro 'dogs pa thams cad dang lhan cig tum gnas/ ser sna dang/ gtong ba dang/ tshul khrims dang/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims/
ngang/ bzod pa dang/ gnod sems dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ la lo dang/ bsam gtan dang/ g.yachab dang/ shes rab dang/ 'chawapa ri shes rab nas/ pha rol tu phun pa phyogs
dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang/ bshis ya dang/ mi shes pa'i bar thams cad dang lhan cige sum gnas/ nges pa dang/ mnges pa dang/ log par nges pa dang/ dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang
khanam tho ba dang/ kha na ma tho ba med pa dang/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pas/ chos thams cang rgyug po'i bar dang lhan cig tu me gnas/ 'ang sna tshogs dang/ sas rgyas
dang sems can sna tshogs dang/ chos snatshogs dang/ sna tshogs thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig tu ma gnas/ mingeshes pa dang/ shes pa dang/ rnam par shes pa dang kun rmo
bya// don dam pa nas/ sems can thams cad kyi mtshan ma yid la byed dag dang lhan g tum gnas/ shes rab ma rgyu ba dang/ lus med pa dang/ mtshan 'di med pa dang//
mtshan mamadu ba dang/ 'dus ma byas pa nas/ 'di la byed pa thams cad dang/ sems dang rnam par shes pa'i gnas dag gi bar dang lhan cig tum gnas te/ ngo ga dang gzhan yang 'dus pas la/

spyod pa'i chos dpag tu med pa dag dang lhan cig tum gnas so// de ltar na byang chub sems dapa'i nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gang shes rab de 'dus byas kyi phyedapathams thadang
lhan cale/ tumi gnas te/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// shar bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems
dab 'i sde snod la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la spyod ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'byed mkhas pa yin te/ chos thams cad la mkhas pa rjesu thob bo//
de la shes rab rnamapar 'byed pa gang zhan/ da lta ste/ phung po la mkhas par/ khams la mkhas pa dang/ skye mched lamakhas pa dang/ bden pa la mkhas ba dang/ so so yang dag par
rig ba la mkhas pa dang/ rton pa la mkhas pa dang/ rnam pangashas pa dang ye shes la mkhas pa dang/ byang nubakyi yan lag la mkhas ba dang/ lam la mkhas pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par/
ba/ 'byung ba lamakhas ba dang nu ste/ mkhas pa rnams bcu po 'di dag gi rnam par 'byed pa gang yin pa dang shes rab rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya'o// de la phung bo la khas pa gang

zhen gang 'ad phung po rnams kyi debar bya babastan pa 'di lta ste/ dbu ba rdos ba lta bur bstan pa dang/ smig rgyu lta bur bstanapa dang chu bur lta bur bstan pa dang/ chu shing lta bur bstan pa dang/ sgyu
ma lta bur bstan pa dang/ rmi lam lta bur bstan pa dang/ brag chalta bur bstan pa dang/ mgayor lta bur bstan pa dang/ gzugs brnyan lta bur bstan pa'o// gzugasag chu'i do'u blta bu ste/
dbu ba la'ang bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gang brag med/ skyes bu med/ shing bumad shing las skyes med de/ dbu ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa gzugs kyang nga'i rang bzhin
gongadza lamakhas pa de ni phung bo lamakhas pa zhes bya'o// tshor bani muny+dzichu bur lta bu ste/ chu bur la'angabadag med/ sems can mad/ srog med/ gong thogamad shod bu med/ shad las
skyagamed/ rgyu ba po med/ skyes bu med de/ chu bur gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa tshor ba'ang darang bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de na phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 'dushesanag/
rgyu lta bu sto/ smagergyu la'ang bdagamed/ sems can med panas/ skyes bu med pa'i bar du ste ka smig rgyu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa 'dushes kyang de'ing bzhin yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa ldani
@#// phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// 'du byed rnams ni chu shing lta bu ste/ rlu shang la'ang bdag med/ sems can med srog med pa nas/ skyes bu'i bar du yod pa ste/
chu shing gi rang bzhin gang yin pa 'du byed dag kyang de'i rang bzhin yin te/ gangad lamakhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa ni sgyum lta bu ste/ sgyu ma la'ang bdag
medu sems can med/ srog med/ gang thagamed/ shed bu med/ shad las skyes mod/ skyes bu med/ byed pa po med/ tshor ba po med pa ste/ sgyu ma'arang bzhin gang yin pa rnam par
shes pa'i rang bzhin yang de yin te/ gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o//gzhan yang phung po rnams zhes bya ba na 'jig rten yo ni taM 'jig rten yang 'dzag pa'i
mtshan nyid do// 'jig rten rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yan paphung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin no// yang 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gang zhen/ 'di la lta/ ma rtag pa'i rang bzhin dang/
sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin te/ phung po'ang de'i rang bzhin no// gang de la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na byang chub samag dba'i phung po la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha
rolaM tu phyin pa la spyodo//de la khams lamakhasapa gang zhin/ 'di lta ste chos kyi khams ni sa'akhoms mod kyi/ chos kyi khams sra ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams/
3 na chu 'khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams rlan pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams na mi'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams tshaba'amtshan nyid ma yin te// chos kyi khams na sgrung gi
khams modakyi/ chos kyi khams g.yo ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams mthong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// sa kyi

khams ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi chos kyi khams sgra rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams dri snom pa'i mtshan/

nyingam yin no// chos kyi khams ni lce'i rnam par shes ba'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams ro myong ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams ni lus kyi rnamapar shes pa'ikhams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams
reg pa'i mtshan 'ad ma yan no// chos kyi khams na yid kyi rnam pajashes pa'i khams mod kyi/ chos kyi khams rnam par sgom pa'imtshan nyid ma yin no// chos kyi khams dang bdagag lams don mtshungs so//
'dod pa'ikhams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugasamed pa'i khamasana mtshungs so// 2kho ba'i khams dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams de mtshungs so// de ltar chos thams cad kyi khams
danam mkha'i khamasade mtshungs te/ stong pa nyid dang mtshungs pas mtshungs pa ma 'gyur ba dang mtshungs pasa mtshungs te/ 'dus byas kyi khams su 'jug pa dang/ 'dus mthus kyi khams su 'jug pa'i
wusu/// phyir/ de la bshadapa dpag tumadade/ gang khams la'ajug pa des rab tu 'byed pa da ni mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar n khams la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems pa'//
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyodo// dalabyang chub sems dpa' skyemachod lamakhas pa gabastan/ 'di la mig bdag dang bdag gis stong ba ste/ thachub
sems dpa' mag gi rang bzhin 'di lta bu 'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ de ni nga chub sems dpa' semachad la mkhasapa'o// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin du rnab dang/
sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yade bdag dang bdag gis stong pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' yid kyi rang bzhin na 'di ltabu'o zhes yang gapa ji lta ba bzhin du rab rtogs te/ gal sogs pa'i phyir gang
skye mched la kun sogs pa dang// sna tshogs sogasapa da dragasogs par mi byed cing/ dge ba dngayadage ba'as rnams la 'dushes gnyis sum 'jug ste/ de na byang chub sems dpa' skyemachod la
mkhas pa'o// 'di na mig gi skye mched do// 'din gzugs kyi skye mched do zhes de ltagamig dang gzugs rnams la 'dod chagasayod par mthong yang/ 'dod chags med pa mngon du ma byed pa/
de ni phungachub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o// rna ba dang sgra/ sna ngang dri/ lce dang ro/ lus dang reg/ yid dang chos/ gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar byang chub sems pa'i yid dang chos
kyi bar du 'dod chagasamad par mthong mod kyi/ 'dod chags med pa mngon du ma byed pa de na byang chub sems dpa' skye mched la mkhas pa'o// skye mched ces bya ba de'ang 'phags pa'i skye
mchod dang/ 'phags pa ma yin pa 'i skye mched de/ de la 'phags pa'i skye mched ni gang lam sdud par byed pa'o// 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched ni gung lam gtong bar byed pa 'di lta ste/
byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pan sems can lam la brtson pa bor zhing gnas pa la snying rdzachen po thob cing/ lamamasumachodakyang ma gtong ba ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skya
'chad la mkhas pa'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sku mched lamakhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa 'amakhas bgang
zhen byang chub sems dpa'i bongan pa la 'jug pa mkhas pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste/ 'di lta sta/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang/ kun 'byung ba shes pa dang/ 'gog pa shes pa dang/ lam shes
pa'o[;]de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhin/ gang phung po rnams la mi skye bar shes pa da na sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya'o// de la kun byung ba shes pa gang zhan gang grod pa 'dzoms
pa zhes bya ba de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o// de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang mi 'byung mi 'jig par shes pa de 'gog pa shes pa zhes bya'o// de la lamangashes pa gang zhe na/
gang mnyam pa nyid thob pa'i chos rnams la sgo ma 'dogs pa de ni lam shes pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshabyang chub sems dbas bden pa 'di bzhi de ltar shes rab
kyis shes kyang sems can yongs su snyan par bya ba'i phyir mngon du ma byed pa de na bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bden pa la mkhas pa rnam pa gsum ste/ 'di lta ste/kun rdzob kyi

'don pa dang/ don dam pa'i bden pa dang/ mtshan nyid kyi bden pa'o// de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i 'jig rten gyathe snyad ji snyed pa dang/yig dang/ sgra dang/ brdar bstanapa ste/ de na kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes

bya'o[;]de la don dam pa'ibaden pa gang zhen/ gang la sems kyi rgyu ba'angamedan yig lta ci smos te/ den don dam pa'ibaden pa zhes bya'o// de la mtshan nyid kyi bden ba gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/mtshan nyi tham

cad mtshan de gcige la/ mtshan de gcig pa mtshan nyid med pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'chad pas ma skyo// don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du byed par mi phyung/ mtshan nyid kyi/
bden pa mtshan nyid med pas rtogs par byed pa de na byang chub sems dpa'ibaden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang bden pa nigacig pu/ gnyis ma yin pa/ 'di lta ste/'gogapa'i bden pa'o//
de la bden pa gcig pu la gangasgom 'dogs pa dang/ sems can sgro 'dogos par ltung ba rnams la bden pa rab phyed padan byang chub sems dpa'i nub mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang phubo lnga

rnams ni sdug bsngal ba ste/ gang thung po lnga rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid de ni sdug bsngal zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid rtogs pade ni sdug bsngal 'phags

pa'i badenapo zhes bya'o// gang phung po lnga rnams kyi bag la nyal rgyu med pa las byung ba'i lta bde ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'o// gang sred pa'i rgyu lta bde la'ang sgrom 'dogasami len mi snyems pa

ni kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'ibaden pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po lngarnayaMs shin tuthad pa'i phyir 'gog pa ston gyi mthar m byung ba/ phyi ma'i mthar i 'pho ba/ da ltar byung bar ma gnas pa de ni 'gog pa
'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang lam la brten nas sdug bsngal shes pa dang/ kun 'byung shes pa dang/ 'gog pa shes pa la'ang reg par byed la// rjes las rtogasapa'i shes pa'i ng thob par

byed pa da ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// gang bden pa shes ba de la rnam par rtogapa dang/ sems can yongs su brtag pa la rtog par byed pa de ni byang chub sems

dpa'i bden pa lamakhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshor ba thams cad sngagabasngal ba ste/ de la tshor bur bya ba rnam par phyed pa dang/ blos rig pa ltare/ stagabasngal 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o// rgyug

gis kun 'byung bar shes pa'i rgyud ji lta ba yang dag par rab tu shes pa de ni kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bdenapa zhes bya'o// gang tshor ba gtong zhing ma tshong ba tshor bar byed pa dang/ 'gog pa'i ng so sor rtog/
la tshor ba 'gog pa'i mngon du ma byed pa de byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bdenapa zhes bya'o// tshor ba gang gis gzengs dang 'dra ba'i lam de/
sdud par byed la/ tshor bar dgos pa'i ng ma yin/ lam gyi dgos pa'i ng ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i rtenang zhes bya'o// de ltar rtogs/
nas bden pa de bzhi lamanyam bar mthong zhing/ mthong ba shin tu dag pa'i ng ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'ibaden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang skye ba sdug bsngal ba ste/ g.ya skye ba

la so sor rtog pa shes pa de ni sngag bsngalunyes pa zhes bya'o// srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye bsta/ gangasrid pa 'jig pa shes pa de ni kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya'o// skye bo thams cad gang gis mi skyo bar
ngashes la/ de la 'gog pa gang yong mad cing/ gang mi 'gog par shes pa de ni zad pa 'gog pa shesapa zhes bya'o// gang de ltatshorab dang/ 'jal ba dang/ yongs su tshol ba dang/ rnam par rtog
pa dang/ 'juparishesapadi ni lam shes pa zhes bya sa/ gang bdonaparishes ba de la gzhog par byed kyang/ bden parishas pa de la mi gnas pa de'i byang chub sems dpa' bdenapa la mkhas pa ste/
de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i so so dgapar rig pa la mkhas pa gang zhen/bzhi po 'di dag ni
byang chub sems dpa'i so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/
dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rigapa'o// de la don so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhe na/ gang chos rnams la don dam pa'i tshig tu shes pa dang/ gnyis su med pa'i rgyu
shes pa dang/ rkyenu shes pa dang/ 'dus pa shes pa dang/ mtha' med pa'i rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dang/ rtan pa la 'jug pa shes ba dang// chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes pa dang de bzhin/
nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma gnas pa shes pa dang/ stong pa nyid rjesasu rtogs pa shes pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa rtogs par shes pa dang/ san pa med
pa la smon pa med par shes pa dang/ mngon par 'dum byed pa la mngon par 'dum byed par shes pa dang/ tshul gcig tu 'jug pa shes pa dang/ sems can madapar 'jug pa shes pa dang//
bdag med par 'jug pa shes pa dang/ srog med par byed pa shes pa dang/ gang zag med par don dam par shes pa dang/ 'das pa'i sa la ma chags pa shes pang/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la
mtha'amed par shes pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la thams cad phushes pa dang/ phung po rnams la sgyuangashes ba dang/ khams rnams la sbrul gdug ba lta bu shes ba dang/ skye mched rnams la stod
pa nyid du nges par rtog pa shes pa dang/ nang zhi ba shes pa dang/ phyi rol tum rgyu ba shes pa dang/ yul la yul med par shes pa dang/ dran pa la gnas su shes pa dang/
rtogs pa la khong du chud par shes pa dang/ blo gros la mno sumadu shes pa dang/ bden pa la rab tu rtogs par shes pa drang/ sdug bsngal la ma 'byung bar shes pa dang/ kun 'byung ba la mngon par
'dum byed pa shes pa dang/ 'gog pa la mtshan nyid med pa'i nyisapa dang/ lam la sgrol bar shes pa dang/ chos la tshig rab rtatha dad pa shes pa dang/ dbang po rnams la 'jug par shes pa
dang stobs rnams la mi brdzi banganyis pa dang/ zhi gnas la gnas sus pa dang/ lhag mthong la snang bar shes pa dang/ sgyu ma la bsgrub pa shes pa dang/ smig rgyu la 'brug pa rang shes/
pa dang/ rmi lam la mi bden pa ma shong ba shes pa dang/ brag cha la rkyen la 'jug par shes pa dang/ mig yor la 'pho bar shes pa dang/ mtshan nyid sna tshogs la mtshan nyid gcig tus pa dang/
'du ba la 'bral bar shesapa dang/ rab tu sbyangs pa la phyir maraMms sbyor ba med pa shes pa dang/ nyan thos kyi thug pa la sgra'i rjes su 'gro bar 'jug pa shes pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thag pa/
la rten pa la 'jug pa shes shing dben pal mchog tu shes pa dang/ theg pa chen po la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa thams cad ngagos pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i don so so
[e ]yang dag pa 'jig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang don so so yang dag par rig pa ni gang don la rton pa lta/ chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kun kyi don la rton pa nyid kyi rjesasu 'brang ba'o// de'i
phyir zhen/ chos thams cad ma lus par stong ba ste/ stong pa'i don gang yin pa de ni donano/ chos thams cad ma lus par mtshan ma med pa ste/ mtshan ma med pa 'don gang yin pa de ni don no//
chos thams cad ma lus par smon pa med pa ste/ smon pa med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos thamAnam lus par rnam par phye ba ste/ rnam par phye ba'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// chos
thumasacad m lus bar sems can med/ srog med/ gang brag med pa ste/ gang zag med pa'i don gang yin pa de ni don no// gang de lta bu'i don rnams rtogs pa de ni so so yang dag par zhes ba
ste gang don ston pa ni gnas med pa ston pa'o// de ni mi zad pa ston pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa ni rtogs pa'i don ston pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gnang ba
rjes su yi rang ba/ yang dag pa/ de bon/ gzhan ya yin pa/ shes pa sashin tu rtogs pa/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba medapalen byang chub sems dpa' don so so yang dag par rig pa zhes ba'o/
de la chos so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhen/ gang dge ba dang/ mi dge ba dang/ lan ma tho ba dang bcasapa dang/ kha na ma tho ba med pa dang/ zag pa dang rus pa rang
zag pa med pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas dang/ kun nas nyon mo ngas pa dang/ rnam par byung ba'
dang mthun pa dang/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par lta bar 'gro ba'i chos rnams la 'jug pa shes pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid shes pa dang/ byang chub manyam pa nyid shes pa dang
khams mnyam pa nyid shes pa ste/ de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang chos so so yang dag par rig pa ni/ gang 'dod chags spyod pa rnams la sems 'jug pa
shes pa dang/ bcos pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang/ 'dod chags brtan par spyod pa rnams dang/ 'dod chags chung ngu spyod pa rnams dang/ rnam par mi ldang ba'i 'dod chags spyod pa
rnams dang/ mtha' ma rtag tu med pa'i 'dod chags spyod pa rnams dang/ de ltar byung ba la rkyen gyis 'dod chags byung pa rnams la 'jug pa ste/ sems can gang dag nang du 'dod chags la/
phyi rol tu'adod chags med pa dang/ phyi rol tu 'dod chags la/ nang du 'dod chags med pa dang/ nang du'ang 'dod chags med/ phyi rol tu'ang 'dod chagasamed pa dang/ nang dang phyi rol tu 'dod/
chags pa dang/ nga dang phyi rol tu 'dod chags med nga dang/ gzugs la 'dod chags la/ sgra la 'dod chags med pa dang/ sgra la 'dod chags la// gzugs la 'dod chagasamad pa dang
gzugs dang sgra la 'dod chags med pa dang/ dra la 'dod chags med pa dang/ dri la 'dod chags la/ regal 'dod chags med pa dang/ reg la 'dod chags la/ ro la 'dod chags med pa/
dang/ rol 'dod chags la/ gzugs la 'dod chags med pa dang/ dril 'dod chags med pa de ni 'dod chags spyod pa rnams kyi 'jug pa ste/ 'jug pa de'i sgos 'dod chags spyod pa rnams

la nyi khri chig stong/ zhe sdang sred pa rnams la nye khri chig stong/ gti mug spyod ba rnams la nyi khri chig stong/ cha mnyam par spyod pa rnams la nyi khri chig stong ste/ gang de dag ga sred pa brgyad khri/
bzhi stong gi sems 'jug pa shes pa dang/ ji ltar rigs par bstan pa gas pa dang/ mamangs ltung bar bstan pa shes pa dang/ 'dod pa lus yang dag par 'da' bar shes pa dang/ 'do
kyi khyad par shes pa dang/ 'bras bu yod par bstan pa shes pa de ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de la nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhin/ gangs
thams cad la skad yod par 'jug pa shes pa dang/ lha'i skad dang/ klu'i skad dang/ gnod sbyin gyi skad dang/ dri za'i skad dang/ ma 'gaci'i skad dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i skad dang/ mi dang mim
yin pa'i skad dang/ 'gro ba sngar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyiskad dang/ sgra dang dbyings rnams las skad des de dag la chos 'chad pa ste/ don nges pa'i so so yang dag par rig ba zhes bya'o//
de ltar chos de dag brtag par bya'o// de ltar chos dedag bsdu bar bya'o// de ltar chos de dag rjes su rgyun chags par bya'o// de ltar chos de dag yi ge rnams kyis
sbrel bar bya'o// de tshig gcig gi gludags shes tshag gnyis pa'i bla dgas shes/ tshig mang po'i bla dgas shes/ bud med kyi tshigashis/ skyes pa'i tshig shes[ï¼‰ ]mnang gi tshig shes//
bsdus pa'i gshes/ rgyas pa'i tshig shes smad pa'i tshigangashes/ bstod pa'i tshig shes/ 'dasapa'i mig shes/ ma 'ongs pa'i tshog shes/ da ltar byung ba'i gshes/ yi gegage
gis sgro btags pa shes/ yige mang bos sgro btags pa shes te/ den nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par ge pa zhes bya'o// yang de'i nges pa'i tshagaso so yong dag par rig pa na 'khrul pa
ma yin/ zlos pa ma yin/ brtags pa ma yin/ don gsal ba'i ya shes yongs su byang ba ste/ ci nas kyang 'bor yang dag par dga' ba sna tshogs pa zab pa// zab par snang ba/ kun rdzob
ngadon dam pas brgyan pa/ bdagagasems mthong ba'i shes pa la rag lus pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba/ sems can thams cad dga' bar byed pa sta/ dan byang chub sems dang re nges pa'i
tshig so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa gang zhen/ gang tshig bzang ba/ ma gnas par lung bstan pa ston
ba rgyun ma 'chad pa/ spobs pa mur ba/ spobs pa mgyogs shing myurab/ slobs pa ma rmongs pa/ b+bas pa ji ltar dris pa bzhin pa/ spobs pa yongs su ma nyams pa// spobs bzhi
'galab/ spobs pa rtsod pamed pa/ stobs pachos la rab tu dgarab/ spobs pa bzod pa la gnas pa/ spobs pa zab pa/ spobs pa sna tshogs/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa la slobs ba/ sbyin pa dang/
tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab thams cad la gnas ba'i slobs pa/dran panye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spyod pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba dang/
bang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ zha gnas dang/ lhag mthong la spobs pa/ bsam gtanAdang/ rnamapar thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug/
pa dang/ bden pa la 'jug pa thachos cad shes pa'i spobs pa/ thig bathams cad laspobs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi samasu dang spyod pa la bas pa/ tshigam lhag pa'i slobs pa//
tshig mi tshubapa'i spobs pa/ tshig me 'chal ba'i slobrasapa/ chigartsub mo ma yin pa'i spobs pa/ rmigaman pa'i spobs pa/ mig dag pa/ rmag grol ba/chagamachagam/ tshig btsun pa/
tsheg 'brel ba/ tshig ldan pa/ tshag ma nyams pa/ tshig snyan pa/tshig 'jam pa/ migam smad ba/ tshig 'phags pa thams cad kyis bstod bste/ zhing mtha' yas pa'i rnam pa shes pa'irjes
su song ba'i sgra/ tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyi dbyangs dang 'dra ga rtogs par byed pa'i sgra gcig pa/ sas rgyas kyis gnang ba'i srobs pas sems can gzhan dang gang zag
gnangag la chos ston to// de'i chos bstan pa de 'ang 'byung bar byed pa/ de byed pa'i sdug bsngalu yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba ste/ den byang chub sams dpa' spobs pa so so yang dag par ge
pa zhes bya'o// den byang chub sems dpa' slobs pa la mkhas pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' stobs pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
de la bung rlabasems dpa' rten pa la mkhas pa gang zhen/ byang chub/mas dpa' rnams kyi rton pa 'di bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don la rton gyi/ tshig 'bru la ma yin pa dang
ye shes la rton kyi/ rnam par shes pa la ma yin pa dang/ nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rnams la rton gyi/ drang ba'i don rnams la ma yin pa dang/ chos nyid la rton gyi/ gang brag la ma yin no/
de la don gang/ tshig 'bru gang zhen/ tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang 'jig rten gyi chos kyi bya ba la 'jug pa'o// don ces bya ba gang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rtogs pa'o// chig
'bru zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa dang/ dul ba dang/ sdom pa dang/ des ba bstanang 'o// ngon ces bya ba ni dul ba dang/ zhi gnas dang/ gsarapa ma yin pa dang/ snying pa ma yin pa dngashes pa'o// mag
'bru zhes bya bani 'khor ba yongs su bshad pa sgrogs pa'o// na ces bya bani ma demags pa la rten pa'o// chig 'bru zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan yongs su sgrogs pa'o//
do tsas dra ban chos rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la rnam pa ma rtog pa'o// gi 'bru zhes bya ba'i theg pa ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa bzhin du 'chad pa'o// don ces bya ba ni
sa tshul gcig partog par ngashes pa'o// chig 'bru zhes byabani sems can thams cad mgatong bar bstan pa'o// don ces bya bani 'khor gsum yongasasu dag pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba'i
lus dang/ ngagadang/ bde sdom zhing bslab pa dang/ sbras pa'i yon tan thams cad yang dag par len par bstan pa'o// don cas bya ba lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid mi dmigs shing
mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya bani gnod sems kyi bla ba dang/ khro ba dang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgyags pa dang/ dregs pa 'jom zhing babrod pa dang nges pa bstan ba'o//
don cis bya ba namaskye ba'achos la bzod pa 'thob pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni dge ba'artsa ba la brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad bstan pa'o// don ces bya ban ma lan mi gtong ba la gnas pa'i
brtson 'grus so// tshig 'bru zhes phyab ni bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzan dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya bani 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa
shes pa'o// tshags 'bru zhes bya ba ni thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o// don cis gzhi brjod du med pa'i don pa'i don to// rmig 'bru zhes

byakhan byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun kyi chos rnams rab tu bstan pa'o// don cis bya bani gong byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams nan tan du byed pa'i 'thus
bu mngon sum du byed pa'o// tshag 'bru zhes bya ban sdug bsngal dang/ kun 'byuT pa dang/ lam rab tu bstan pa'o/ 'don ces bya ba ni 'gog pa mngon du byed pa'o/ chig 'bru
zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa lasogs te 1 sha'abar du bstan pa'o// don cos bya ba ni ma rig pa 'gog panas/ rga shi'i bar du 'gog pa'o// tshag 'bru zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang
lhag mthong gi tshogs bstan pa'o// ngon cas bya ba ni rig pa dang rnam par grol ba shes pa'o//chog 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang 'dod chags dang/ zhesdang dang/ gti mug dang/ chamanyamapar
spyod pa rnams lachos bstan pa'o// donacas khyab nasoms rnam par grolab ma 'khrugs pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba na sgrib par byed pa'i chos thams cad rab tuston pa'o// don ces bya ba ni
sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes rnamar ba thar pa'o/ 'tshag 'bru zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan bsngags pa mtha'amad pa yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'o// don ces bya ba ni gang chos 'dod
mthas chags med ba dang/ 'dus ma byas pa'i dge 'dun gyi yon tan bsgrub pa'o// tshig 'bru zhes bya ba ni gang byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du
bslab pa dang yon tan rtsom pa bstan pa'o// don ces bya ban sems kyi skad cigagagadang ldan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ya shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o// mdor
na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stongagi bar du bstan pa de ni tshage 'bru zhes bya'o// sgra dang/ yi gi dang/ tshag 'bru thams cad brjod du med pa'i don ni don to// de la drang ba'i don

byamadosde gang zhan/ gang tshag 'bru bshad pa ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rgya cher khong du chud par bya ste/ 'di dag ni drang pa'i don gyi mdo sde dgago/ nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang nan/ ngon gang bshad pa

ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rgya mar khong du chud par bya ste/ de dgan nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde ngag go/ du ji ltar na chos la rton gyi/ gang zag lam yin zhen/ gang drang ba'adzin dang 'geng thagagadon
yin pas da lam rten gyi/ ganganges pa'i don don chos 'di ji lta ba bzhin pas de la rton pa ste/ 'di gan thapatshubasamasadapa'i rton pa bzhi pa'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rton pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do///bam po bco brgyad pa/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshoge 'bru
lamakhas pa gang zhen/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyis lamakhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// chos gnyis gzhin/ 'di lta ste//
rnam par shesapa la mkhas pa dang/ yogs la mkhas pa yin no// de la rnam par shes pagang/ ye shes gang zhe na/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ban/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par
shes pa'i gnas pa bzhi'o// bshegang zhen/ gzugs la zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa yosasu gnas shing gnas pa dang/ tshor ba la zhugs pa dang/ 'du shes la zhugs pa dang/ 'du byed
lazhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa yongs su gnas shing gnas pa ste/ de ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o// de la yang shasagang zhen/gang len pa'i phung po lta rnams la gnas pa/ rnam par shes/
pa'i phung po yo sasu shes pa de ni yi shes zhes bya'o// gang sa'i khams rnam par shes pa dang/ chulekhams dang/ ma'i khams dang/ rlung gi khams rnam par shes padana rnam
par shes zhes bya'o// gang yang ye shes khams bzhi la mi gnas pa chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa shes pa de ni ye shes bya'o// gzhan yang rnamaM pa shes pa zhes bya banigang mig gi
rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams ngashes pa dang/ rnaba'i ma ba shes pas shes par bya ba'i sgra rnams dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang/ lce'i yapar
shes pas shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang/ lus kyi rnam pa dang shes bsashes par bya ba'apheg rnams dang/ yid rnam pang zhes pas shes pa bya ba'i chos rnams shes pa ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o
gang yang nang gi skye mched rnams la bar zhi zhing/ phyi rol gyi skye mched rnams la rgyu bamed pa ye shes la rtonapas/ chos gayang gazhog pa ma byed pa don la shes zhes bya'o/ gzhan yang tshud
shes pa zhes bya ban dmigs ba las rnam par shes pa skye ba dang/ yongs su rtog pa los rnam par shes pa skye ba ste/ nanem par shes pazhes bya'o// gang yang mi 'dzin pa/ mi sems pa/ mi
dmigs pa// rnam par ma rig pa/ mi 'khrugs pa dan yongashes zhes bya'o// gzhan yang 'dus byas ma spyad pa'i chos rnams la rnam par shesapa gnas kyi/ 'dusam byas pa la rnam par shes pa rgyu ba
med de/ gang yang 'dus ma byas shes pa don ye shes so// gzhan yang skye ba dang 'jig pa la gnas pa de ni rnam par shesanga'o// gangam sku mi 'gagam gnas pa de ni yi shes zhes bya'o// de las

bdon gyamado sde gang drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde gang zhe na/mdo sngagang dag lam la 'jugapar byed pa de dgan drang ba'i don cis bya'o// mdo sngagang dag 'bras bu la 'jug par byed pa de dag ni nges pa'i

don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dag kun rdzob sgrub par byed pa de dgan drang ba'i don ces bya'o// mdo sde gang dgadon dam pa bstan bdedag ni nges pa'i don ces bya'o// gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag las kyi bya ba
la 'jug pa de dag ni drang ba'i don cas bya'o// mdo sde gang dag las dang nyon mongs pa phrad par bstan pa de dag ni dzes pa'i don ces bya'o// gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag kun

nas nyon mongs pa yongs su bshad pa'i phyir bstanang de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag rnam par byang ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir bstan pa de dag na nges pa'i don to// mdo sde gang dag 'khor bas skyo/
bar byed pa de dgun drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag 'khor ba dang yungan las 'das pa gnyis su mi 'gu pad dag nanges pa'i don to// mdo sngagang dug yi ge dang chag sna tshogs su bstanapadi dag
ni drang ba'adon to// mdo sde gangadag zab pa/ lta dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' bde ngag ni nges pa'i don te/ mdo sde gang dag yig 'brumang ba sems can rnams kyisems rangs par byed pa de

dag na drang ba'i don to/ 2mdo sngagang dgatshagadang tshig 'bru nyung la nges par rtog par byed pa de dag ni nges pa'i don to// gzhan yang mdo sde gang dag bdag dang/ sems can dang/ srog dang/ skye bu
dang gang zag dang/shed bu dang/ shed las skyes dang/ byed pa po dang/ tshor ba po' sgra sna tshogs bdag po med pa bdag po yod pa bzhin du bstan pa de dag ni drang ba'i don to// mdo sde gang dag/
stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smonapamed pa dang/ ma 'byung ba dang/ ma skyes pa dang/ yang dgapar ma 'byung ba dang/ sems can med pa dang/ gang zag med pa dang/ dus gsum
las rnam par thar ba'i sgo bstan pa de dag nges pa'i don ces bya'o// de la chos gang/ gang thog ga zhen/ gang gang zag tul ba la gnas chos kha cag la rtsom pa don gang brag chas/
bya'o gang zag tu lta ba rtsom pa de'agang chos gnas pa chos kyi dbyinges don chos zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang zag nisoso'i skya bo'i gang zag dang/ so so'i skye bo dge ba'i gang zag dang/
dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'agang thag dang/ chos kyi rjes su 'brang pha'i gang zag dang/ brgyad pa'i gang zag dang/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i gang zag dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'gang zag dang
phyir mi 'ong ba'i gang brag dang/ dgra bcom pa'i gang zag dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gang zag dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i gang zag dang/ skye bo mang po la phan pa dang/ skya bo mang po la
bde budang/ 'jig rten la thugs brtsa ba dang/ lha dang mi'i skya bo phal po che'i don dang/ phanapa dang/ bde ba'i phyir gang zag gcig 'jig rten du skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur 'di lta
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcomapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ gang zag gi sgra de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzobakyi gnas kyis soms na rnams gzud
pa' phyir bstan pa'o// de la gang mngon par chags pa de dag ni rten pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o// de dag rtog pa la dgod pa'i phyir chos nyid la rton par bya'i pa sa sa pa ke da
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsus te/ de la chos nyid gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ ma 'gyur ba/ sgro ma btags pa/ ma byed pa/ rnamapar mi byed pa/ mi gnas pa/ gnas
mad nga/ rtsa ba medapa/ thams cad du mnyam pa// mnyam pa la nyan pa// mi mnyam pa la mnyam pa/ mnyam pa dang ma mnyam pa la mnyam pa/ rnam par mi rtogapa/ ma rtsom pa/ nges par

gyur pa thob pa/ chos thams cad shin tu ngo bo 'di med pa'i mtshan nyid de ni chos nyid ces bya ste/ gang dag chos 'adi la rton par byed pa de dag ni khams gang la'ang rton par ma byed de/ de bas na chos kyi
tshul gya sgo la 'jug pa 'dis chos thams cad la rton pa'i lung chos thams cad de lta bu'i chos nyung yin no// de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rton pa bzhi zhes bya ste/ de nabyang chub
shisams dpa'i rton pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rton pa la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa la sprod do/ de la byang chub sems dpa'
tshogs la mkhas pa gang zhan/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshogs na 'di gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsod nams kyi tshog sarung/ ya shas kyi tshogs so/
de la bsod nams kyi tshogs gang zhen/ sbyin pa la byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang/ tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang/ sgom pa las byung ba'isod
0 nas bya ba'i dngos po dang/ byams pa'i sems la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ snying rje'i sbyor ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pa dang/ bdag dang pha rol gyi sdig ba 'chags pa dang/
dus gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dang/ slob pa thams cad dang/ mi slob pa thams cad dang/ rang sus rgyas thams cad dang/ sems dang bo bskyed pa rnams dang/ spyod pa la
zhugs pa thams cad dang/ phyi ma ldog pa rnams/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang/ 'as pa dang/ mo napa nga/
nga ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ra/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ 'phugs pathamA
cad la tshos gsol ba 'debs pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang/ dge ba thams cad byang chub tubasngo ba dang ldan pa'ibasod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang/ sems can byang chub tu
samasam bskyed pa rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam ston pa dang/ dbul po rnams la longs spyod kyis sdudapa dang/ nad
pa rnams la sman sbyin pang/ gus par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ mthu chung ba rnams la 'bod cing dang du lonapa dang/ ltung ba rnams ma 'chab pa dang/ sdig pa chags pa dang/ sos
/rgyas bcom ldan 'angasabazhubs pa dang yos su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams la bsnyen bkur dang ri mo thams cad byed pa dang/ slob dpon dang mkhanapo rnams la ston
pa bzhin du ri mo byed pa dang/ chos la rin po che rin thang med pa bzhin du yongs su tshol ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ chos smra ba la dga' zhing dpag tshad brgyar yang song ste/ chos nyan pas chog
mi shes pa dang/ zang zing med par chos 'chad pa dang/ pha dang ma la rim gro byed pa dang byas pa gzo ba dang/ byas ba zhes pa dang/ 'gyod pa med kha dang/ bsod nams bsags pas chog ma shes pa
dang lus bsdams shing+ga tshul 'chos nga med pa dang/ ngag bsdams pa'i ngag la tshul 'chos pa med pa dang/ yang bsdams pa'i yid latshul 'chos pa med pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs
ba'imachod rten btsugs pa'i phyir tshangs pa'ibs da nams yos su 'dzan pa dang/ mchod sbyin gtan pa med pa bsags pas mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'itshogs sna tshogs
bsags pas yo byad bzang po yongs su rdzogasapa dang/ nga rgyalamed pas lus brgyan pa dang/ ngag gi nyes pa thams cad pas pas ngag brgya pa dang/ blo thogs pa mad pas sems brgyan/

pa dang/ mngon par shes pa sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang// ye shes yongs su dag pasachos kyamtshan nyid kyi rgyan dang/ phram dang/ zhegacod pa dang/ dbye ba'i tshig yongs su spangs bas
'khor mang po'i rgyan dang/ chos 'dzin pas 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyi rgyun dang/ rab tu dga' nas legs so bya ba ni pas chos kyi gtam mi 'jigs par byed pa dang/ sgrib pa dang chod pa rnam
par spangs shing gus par chos nyan pas 'brasabu yod par chos 'chad pa dang/ sas rgyas rnams la dka'athub kyi nags tshal phul bas byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

sngon du 'gro zhing byang chub kyi sems mgatong bas byang chub kyi sA ngapo'arkyen dang/ las dang nyon mongs pam dmigs pas tshe dang shi 'pho yongs su dag pa dang/ na po tshe 'phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad
yongasasu gtong bas gnarin po che dang/ mi zad pa'i smon lam thobang la longs spyod ma zad pa dang/ khrogar me dang sa mthong ma thag tu sems can rnams dad cing bzhin 'dzum pas gsong por smral
dang sems can thams cad la 'od zer snyams pas mnyam pa nyid kyi rgyan thob pa dang/ ma lebs pa lam bar s pas 'od mang po gtong ba dang/ tshul khrims kyi bsod nams bsags pas skyab
yongs su dag pa dang/ ltung ba lami rtsodapas mngal yongs su dag pa dang/ dge ba bcu'i las yongs su dag pas lha dang mir skye ba dang/ sa su bstan pa thams cad la rab tu rtog pas gdonayi
tha bar gnon pa dang/ chos la slobadapon gyi dpe mkhyud med pas chos kyi dbang phyug dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas 'jig rten thams cad la mngon sum pa dang/ nyi tshe ba'i spyod pa'i
'dod pas rgya chen po'i chos la dad pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi 'don bas bsod nams thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ dad pa sngon du 'gro bas nor
bdun yongs su rdzogs pa dang/ sngon dam bcas pa nyams su len par byed pas 'jig rten thams cad mi slu ba dang/ dge ba'i chos yongs su rdzogs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su
rdzogs pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems pa'i ye shes kyi tshogs la mkhas pa gang zhe na/ rgyu gang gi/

ye shes skye ba ste/ de ltar rgyu dang rkyen gang dang gang gis ye shes rtogs pa'o// de la rgyu gang/ rkyen gang zhe na/ chos tshol ba la rab tu 'dun pa dang/ ye shes kyi rjes su song pa'i bshes gnyenabastan
pa dang/ sas rgyas kyi yi shes la rton gyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yashes la mi rton pa dang/ de dag nga rgyal mi byed pa dang/ bla ma la dga' bdang/ ston pa la dga' ba dang/ de'i dge
ba'i bshes gnyenang dag gis 'di ni bsam pa dang ldan par ngashesanas// yongashes kyi gtam gang yang mi ston pa med pa dang/ snod du shes nas bar chad med par sems rtsa gcig tu chos ston
pa dang/ des chos d thos nas chos kyi tshogs la brtson par byed de/ gapachos kyi tshogs la brtson par byed pa de 'de de'i ye shes kyi tshogs la brtsonapa yin no// de la chos kyi tshogs labartson
0 ba gang zhen/ 'ad lta ste/ don nyung ba dang/ bya ba nyung ba dang/ sgra nyung ba dang/ srod dang thongs la mi nyal zhing rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang/ 'brel ba'i don la yongs su rtog pa dang/ phyi
ning yongs su tshol ba dang/ sems la rog pa med pa dang/ sgrib pa gnon pa dang/ ltung ba las 'byung bar shes pa dang/ 'gyod pa med pa dang/ kun nas ldang ba med pa dang/ nan tan snying
por byed pa dang/ chos la gzhol ba dang/ chos la 'bab pa dang/ chos la brtul bdang/ rtag par mgo rang gos lame 'bar ba lta bu dang/ ye shes tshol ba nyid la gnas pa dang/ mi
lhod pa dang/ brtson 'grus ma gtong ba dang/ khyad par du 'gro ba dang/ 'du 'dzis ben pa dang/ gcig pu dga' ba dang/ gon pa'i bade ba yide la byed pa dang/ 'phags pa'i ngogs
lo dgu 'ab dang/ sbyangs pa las mi 'gyur ba dang/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa dang/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gsang tshig la mo ma byed pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das
pa'i chos tshol ba la dran pa ma nyams pa dang/ rtogs pa la na rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang/ blo gros la lam gyi rjes su mthun par byed pa dang/mos pa la sdom pa dang/ rkyen la ye
shes kyi rjes su rig pa dang/ khrel yod pa dang/ ngo tshashes pa'i rgyan dang/ sangs rgyas kyi 'gros kyi rjesasu 'gro ba dang/ ma shes pas lub dang/ ma rig pa dang gti mug gi ling tog/
/sel ba dang/ shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang/ rab tu rnam par dgapa dang/ blo rgya che ba dang/ bla ma zhum pa dang/ blo rab tu tha dad pa dang/ mngon sum du shes
pa dang/ gzhan la ragam lus pa'i yon tan dang/ rang gi yon tan gyis mi sems pa dang/ pha rol gyi yon tan la rtog pa dang/ legs par bya ba'i las bya ba'i las byed pa dang/ las kyanem/
par smin pa lam 'gal bar byed pa dang/ las yongs su dag par byed pa sta/ de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yid shes kyi tshogs zhes bya'o// gzhan yang ya shas kyi tshog

na spyin pa bzhi ste/ chos ba la gro ba dang/ s+yA gu dang/ gnag btsa' dang/ glegs bam sbyin pa dang/ chos smra ba la chos kyi snyan sna tshogs sbyin pa dang/ chos smra ba la red pa dang/ bkur sti dang//
tshigs su bcad pa thams cid sbyin pa dang/ chos smra ba la chos kun basdu ba'i phyir g.yo med par legasaso zhes bya ba ni pa ste/ sbyin pa bzhi pod dgu ra yi shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ro//
kun srung ba bzhi rnams ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhigang zhen/ chos smra ba rnams kyi lus yos su srung ba dang/ dge bsrung ba dang/ yul dang ljongs su 'jug pa la
yongs su srung ba dang/ phan pa'i dngos po yosasu srung ba/ kun srung bani bzhi po de dag go/ tabar rton pa bzhi yashes kyi tshogs su 'gyur tu/ bzhi gang zhen/ chos smra ba rnams kyi chos

tshabar rton pa dang/ singashes nya bar rton pa dang/ zang zing rtagar na pa dang/ byang chub nye bar rten pa'o// stobs lha ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ mos pa'i phyi'i
dad pa'i stobs dang/ thos pa tshol ba'aphyir brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjod pa'i phyare dran pa'i stobs dang/ mnyam pa nyid kyi chos la nges par rtogs pa'i phyore ting nge
'dzin gyi stobs dang/ thos pa'i stobs kyi phyi shes rab kyi stobs te stobs lnga po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro// tshul khrims bzhi yongashes kyi tshogs sogasapar 'gyupata/ bzhi
gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos nges pa'i tshul khrims dang/ chos 'tshol ba tshul khrims dang/ chos nges par rtogs pa'i tshul khrims dang/ byang chub tubasngo pa'i tshul khrims ti/ tshul khrims
bzhi po de dag yang shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ro// bzod pa bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs sogs pa'i gyur/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos tsholab la mngon ng ra brtson pas ngan du smras pa/

dngangan du brjod pa'i tshekabazod pa dang/ chos tshol ba la mngon par brtson pas rlung dang/ tsha ba dang/ grang ba dang/ dro ba dang/ skom pa dang/ bkres pa bzod pa dang/ chos tshol ba la mngon pa brtson
bas slob dpon dang mkhan po'i rjesasu 'jug pa dang/ chos tshol ba la mngon por brtson pas stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i chos babod pa ste/ bzod pa bzhi bo de dag
tshunu// ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus bzhi yi shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ta/ bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ shes pa'i brtson 'grus dang/
gzungs kyi brtson 'grus dang/ brtan pa'i brtson 'grus dang/ nan tan gyi brtson 'grus te/ brtson 'grusabazhi po de dag ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi yan lag bzhi
yashes kyi tshogs kyi sogs par 'gyur te/ bzhagong zhen/ 'di lta ste dbon pa dang/ gcig pur ngaga' bo dang/ ye shes dang mngon par shes patshol ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyiye shes la
'jug ste// bsam gtan gyi yan lag bzhapo dedag ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur// shes rab snang ba'i chos 'di bzhi yingashes kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhin/
'di lta ste chad pa la mi gnas pa dang/ rtag pa la mi 'jug pa dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ma 'gal ba dang/ bdagamad pa la mos pa ste/ shes rab snang ba'i chos bzhi po
de dag ye shes kyi tshogs par 'gyur ro// chos 'ad bzhi thabs kyi yashas kyi tshogs su 'gyur/ bzhi gang zhan/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten pa'irjes su 'jug pa dang/ mdo sde'i rjes su
'jug pa dang/ chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag thabs kyi yi shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro// chos 'di bzhi lam gyi tshogs kyi ye shes
la 'jug par 'gyur te/ ba zhi gang zhin/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa'ilam dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam dang/ yan lag brgyad pa'i lam dang/ thams cad
mkhyen pa'i ye shes su 'gro ba'i lam sta/ chos bzhi po de dag lam gyi tshogs kyi yi shes la 'jug par 'gyur ro// mngoms pa 'di bzhi ye shes kyi tshogs sogs par gyur te//
ba zhi gapazhin/ 'di ltaste/ thos pas mngoms pa dang/ bstan pa'i mi ngoms pa dang/ dpyad pasami ngoms pa dang/ ye shes kyisam ngoms pa ste/ ma ngoms pa bzhi po de dag
yang shas kyi tshogs sogs par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni gang sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'grob dung/ zhing thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba ste/ sbyin pa las kyang ye shes kyi
tshogs su blta'o// tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grusadang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes ba dang/ byams pa dang/ sAng dang/ dga' ba dang/ gtang snyoms
lasakyang ye shes kyi tshogs su blta'o// de ci'i phyoge zhan/ ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa'i rtsom pa de thams cad ye shesukyi bar lus pa/ yi shes sngon du 'gro ba/ ye shes la rton pa
ste/ de ye shes la gnas pas yingashas can thams cad kyi rten par 'gyur te/ bdud thams cad kyis kyang de la glags mi rnyed do// sangs rgyus kyi bon gyi rlabs kyang thob/ thams cad
ba@#// mkhyen pa'i yang shas la'ang gzhog par byed do// de gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs// byang chub sems dpa' sems/
dang 'a chen po tshogs rnam pa de gas la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dren pa nye bar gzhag pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/
'di bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dran pa nye bar gzhug pa sgom pa ste/[â€]ba' gang nyan/ 'di lta sta/ lus la lus kyi rjesasu lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhagapa sgom pa dang/ tshor ba la tsho
ba'i rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa dang/ sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba dran pa nye bar bzhag pa sgom pa dang/ chos la chos kyi sasu lta ba dran pa bar gzhag pa sgom pa'o//
de la lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhug pa sgom pa gang zhe na/ shAri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dapa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa de lus kyi sngon gyi tha
la'ang so sor rtog/ lus kyi phyi ma'i mtha'ang so sor rtog/ lus kyi da ltar byung ba la'ang so sor rtog ste/ kyama'o lus 'di ni phyin ci log las byung bste/ rgyudang rkyen las skyo ba/ g.yo
bamed pa/ byed pamed pa/ bdag po med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ 'od ltaste/ dper naphyi rol gyi rtswa dang/ shing gel ba dang/ sman dang/ nags tshalaM ngag rgyu dang rkyen las byung shing
bdag po med ba/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa/ de bzhin du lus 'di'ang rtsa dang/ rtsig pa dang/ shing dang/ bong ba dang/ mig yoral budang/ phung po dang/ khams dang skyemacheta
yongs su 'dzan pa nga/ bdag dang bdag gi 'am/ rtag pa 'am// brtan pa 'am/ ther zug gam/ mi 'gyur ba'i chos kyis stong ste/ lus de rang yang mi byi/ lus sange
po med pa des snying po blang bar bya'o// de la snying po gang zhon/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni chos kyi sku/ rdo rje'i sku mi phyed pa'i sku//
sra ba'i sku/ 'jig rten gsum thams cad dang khyad nugs pa'i skyabag gis bslab par bya'o// bdag gi lus 'di nyis pa duma'i skyon chags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thobs par bya'o zhes de so sor rtog pa'i mathus lags par mthong nas/ 'byung bachen po'i gnas kyi lus yos su srung bar byed de/ nga'i lus na sems can thams cad
kyi ca ngegs par zad pa'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po sa' khams dang/ chu'i khams dang/ ma' khams dang/ rlung gyi lams sgo sna tshogs dang/ dmags pa
sna tshogs dang/ rnam grangs sna tshogs dang/ yo byad sna tshogs dang/ yos su spyod pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams ltathar 'tsho ba de bzhin du/ bdag gi 'byung brje pa pha b+haya/ pa
shukla// pa'i lus 'di sgo sna tshogs dang/ dmigs pa sna tshogs dang/ rnam grang snatshogs dang/ yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi nyi bar 'tsho bar gyur
cigasAmamo// de lus mi rtag pa nyid du'ang so sor rtog mod kyi/ skye ba dang shi 'phos kyang mi skye'o// lus sdug bsngal nyid rang so sor rtog mod kyi/ lus kyi sdug bsngal bas kyang yongs su mi
gdung ngo// lus 'dagamed pa nyid du'ang so sor rtog mod kyi/ sems can yos su smin par bya ba la'ang ma skyo'o// lus zhi ba nyid du'ang so sor rtog mod kyi lus zhi bas ba tang snyoms
su'ang mi ltangang// lus stong pa nyid dang lus dben pa nyid du'ang so sor rtog modakyi/ dben pa'i mur sang mi ltung ngo// de lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na lus la rdzas ngangasAng
por rjes sum mthong ngo// nang gi lus la2nga lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa na nang ga rjesasu song ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi go skabs ma 'byed do// de phyi rol gyi lus la lus ngs su/
lta zhing gnas pa na phyi rol gyi rjes su song ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig ma gnas so// de la lus nyon mongs pa med pas lus kyi las yos su dag pa ldan pa yin no// de lus
yongs su dag nas mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan pa'i sku 'thob bo// de lus brgyan par gyur nas lha dang mi rnams mngon du 'du bar 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sams dpa' yus la lus kyi rjes su lta
ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa'o/ yang ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshong ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta bu'i rtenapa nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa yin zhin/ 'di la byang chub/
sems dpa' gang ca tshor yang rung de thams cad sdug bsngal la zhes re snyam dusems te/ de yang shes kyis rtogs pa dang/ shes rab kyis rtogs pa dang/ thabs kyis rtogs pa'i tshor ba shan
rtogs pas bad bar tshong ba tshor bar byed mod kyi/ 'dod chags kyi bag la nyal yang bag la nyal bar ma byed do// stag bsngal ba'i tshor bas reg nas kyang n gnas ong du skyes pa thams cad
la snying rje chen po skyed cing khong khro ba'i lag la nyal yang bag la nyal bar mi byed ngo dbang ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshong bas rig kyang/ ma rig pa'i bag la
cal gang bag la nyal ba mi byed do/ de tsho ba'i rjes su song ba'adran pas bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gang tshor
ba'ang tshor ba de dag las 'byung bar lta ba yin no// sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba yongs su shes shing zhe ba'i phyir yang 'jug ste/ sems can red deganAtshor ba las 'byung ba mishes
pas de dag bde ba'i tshor ba la dga' bar byed/ sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba la zhesdang bar byed/ bdi bang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la rmongs par byed kyi/ bdag ni
shes rab dang ye shes kyis rjes su rtogs pa'i tshor ba/ tshor ba thams cad sosor sbyang pa dang/ thabs mkhas pa dang snying rje chen pos yongasasu bzung ba'i rtsom pas//
sems can de drag gi tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa'i phyi'i chos bstan pa'o// ci'i phyi'i tsho ba zhes bya zhan/ rtogs pa'i tshor ba de ni bdo bar 'gyur ro// ma rtogs pa'i tshor ba ni
sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ de la rtogs paN+Di tshor ba gang zhen/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srogagal/ gang thag gang yang ma bar byed pa mad de/ chags pa ni tsher
'tsho ba'i// yongs su 'dzin pa ni tshor ba'o// lan pani tshor ba'o/ phyin ci log ni tshor ba'o// rnam par rtog pa ni tshor ba'o/ lta ba'i bag la nyal ba ni tshor ba'o// mig tu 'du
shes pa tshor ba yin pa nas/ yid kyi bar du 'du shes ba ni tshor ba'o// gzugs su 'dug pa tshor ba yin pa nas// chos su 'du shes pa'i bar dun tshor ba'o// gang mig gi 'dus te reg
pa'i rkyen las byung ba'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i bar du de natshor ba zhes bya'o// gong ma bzhin du nang dang phyi'i chos
rnams la sbyar to yid kyi bar du 'dus te rego pa'i rkyen las byung ba'atshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i bar du ni tshor ba
zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rnam grangs kyis tshor ba gcig ste/ de ni sems gcig pus rnam par rig pa'o// tshor ba gnyis te/ phyi dang nang gi'o// tshor ba gsum ste/ 'das ra
rnam par rig pa dang/ ma 'ongs ba rnam par rig pa dang/ da ltar byung ba rnam par rig pa'o// tshor ba bzhi ste/ de na khams bzhi rnam par rig pa'o// tshor ba lnga gang zhin/ de ni phung po
lnga yid la byed pa'o// tshor ba drug ste/ de ni skye mched drug yongs su rtogs pa'o// tshor ba bdun te/ de ni rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun no// tshor ba brgyad de twA de ni log par nges pa'i
sbyorab brgyud de// tshor bo dgu ste/ de ni sems can gyi gnas dgu'o// tshor ba bcu ste/ de ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mo// gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ thams cad nitshor ba/
dmigs pa ji snyed pa dang/ yid la byed pa ji snying pa de thams cad tshor bar bya'o// de bas na sems can tshad med pa'i tshor ba tshad med pa zhes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' tshorawa
la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas pas/ sems can thams cad kyi rab skye ba dang/ 'jig pa dang/ gnas pa la ye shes bskyed par bya ste/ gang sems can thams cad kyi dga'
dang mi gaba'atshir ba la tshor ba shes ba ni byang chub sems dpa' tshor thal tshor ba'i rjes su ltapa'idran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/// de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems lasams kyi
thu'u// rjesasu lta ba'adren pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhen/ gang byang chub sems dpa' de'i mi brjed pa dang/ sba ba dang/ kun bsrung pa dang/ mi g.yeng ba'o// de 'di ltar/
so sor rtog ste/ sems riskye nas 'jig cing zhu ste mi gnas pa/ nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol du'ang mi 'pho ste/ gang bdag gis thog mar sams sbaskyed pa de'ang zad/ med/
rnam par gyur te/ yul nam gnas phyogs na mi gnas pas de rnyed par ma nus te/ sems gang gis deg ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa de dag kyang zad/ mad/ rnamapar 'gyur//
yul nam gnas// phyogs nam gnas so// gang yang byang chub tubasngos pa'isims de'ang ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan nyid med po sku/ gam kyis seyu rab tuingashis/ sam kyis son mi mthong/ sems
kyis sumag mi tshor na/ gang gis bdag blun dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'asems de gang yin/ gang byang chub kyi sems de dge ba'i
skye rtsa ba'i sems dang ma 'grogs/ gang dgu ba'i rtsa ba'i sems de 'ang bsngo ba'i sems dang ma 'grogs/ gang bsngo ba'i sems de'ang byang chub kyi sems dang/ dge ba'i
rtsa ba'i sems dang ma 'grogs so zhes de de ltar so sor rtog pa na/ ma skag mdengang dngang bar ma 'gyur gyi/ de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ rten cing 'brel par
'byung ba zab mo rgyu dang 'bras bu chung ma tha ba'o// gal te sems kyi chos nyid de lta bu sems kyi nga bzhin nyid yin yang chos thams cad rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa/ g.yo//
ba yod pa/ byedi pamed pa/ bdagapo med pa/ ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'grub kyis/ bdag gis bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o// sems kyi chos lung da ma 'bri
bar bya'o// de lamams kyi chos nyid gang/ sgrub pa gang zhan/ sems ni sgyu ma dang 'dra ba ste/ de la smin par byed pa 'ang su'ang med de/ de ni sems kyi chos nyid ngo/
gang yang bdogapa thams cad yongs su btang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par sgrub pa'i rgyan dusngo bar byed pa de na sgrub par byed pa'o// sems rmi lam dang 'dra ba rab tu zhi ba'i
mtshan nyid de ni sams kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang tshul khrims sdomupa'i tshigs sogs so// chos de thams cad myur ba'i mngon pa shes par sngo bden sgrub pa'o//
sams sbag rgyu lta bu shin tu zangapas zad par gyur pade ni sems kyi chos nyid de/ gang yang bazod pa'i stobs dang/ des pa byang chub kyi rgyan bsgrub pa'i phyir sngo bden pa'i sgrub pa'o//
